summary: This allows the character "Testament" to be used in-game.

name: Gumnaam
summary: You are in a unnamed village to investigate missing people. Avoid getting caught by the monsters and complete collecting all the evidence while completing the ritual to escape the haunted village.

name: Gulu: A Tail's Journey
summary: Gulu: A tail's journey, is a 3d-platformer game featuring a cat named Gulu on his journey in the stylized wild nature and villages. Solve puzzles, find the hidden keys to each level, cross the mountains and rivers, and reach the end of this epic story!

name: Guilty
summary: Guilty is a first-person psychological horror game. Play with Peter and discover what your past hides. Access your unconscious to remember your traumas and the scariest memories that are hidden. A traumatic past that gives you a feeling of guilt.

name: Guncar Arena
summary: Guncar Arena is an 80s inspired roguelite vehicular combat bullet hell arena shooter. Drive and shoot your muscle car trough alien hordes and tune it with synergizing upgrades to build an absolute engine of destruction!

name: Gun Knight All Day
summary: Gun Knight All Day is a close quarters bullet hell dungeon crawler about a knight who uses guns. Shoot, dodge, and scavenge your way through the procedurally generated dungeons one room at a time. Challenging boss fights test the sharpness of your skills and the lethality of your weapons.

name: Guardians of Gridvale
summary: Push enemies into water or set them on fire. Use the environment and smart positioning in this tactical, turn based roguelike. Enemies telegraph their moves and the swingmeter decides the damage of your attacks. Equip and level up your heroes and take control of the Guardians of Gridvale!

name: Gun and Buckler
summary: Shoot and deflect bullets as a frog equipped with a gun, a buckler and a sticky tongue.

name: Guardians of Gaia
summary: Guardians of Gaia is a team-based PvP Arena Brawler. Control the battleground using intuitive third person melee combat. Choose from a cast of powerful Guardians and join exhilarating battles.

name: Guild of Dragons
summary: Your settlement-builder with dragon taming. Raise your dragons and build a thriving settlement. Enjoy city-building, dragon taming, exploration, and conquest in a magical world.

name: Guns N' Rushes
summary: Aboard your ship, shoot monsters and build defenses to withstand waves of thousands. Collect experience and upgrade your weapons. Guns N' Rushes is a sci-fi atmosphere game that mixes tower defense and RPG elements.

name: Guitar Zeros
summary: Guitar Zeros is narrative survival sim where you try to manage your band's hectic life on tour. Take a band from humble beginnings to headliners (and God willing keep them all alive).

name: Gumboots Australia
summary: You start with almost no money and must travel from town to town looking for answers. Travelling isn't free of course so on the way you must do odd jobs to earn money to travel with car, bus, or airplane. Of course travelling with car or plane is the fastest but they're also the costliest. You've gotta take into account how much time you still have to solve the mystery otherwise you might have to ask your bosses for an extension. You have about eight chances to extend your deadline but each extension takes away a bonus point. Use your time wisely and accept jobs that pay the highest for the least amount of days to get to your destination.

name: Gust
summary: A retro 2.5D action-runner game settled in a dark world. Race with other players for a spot in the global leaderboard. Interact with your spells. Pass challenging levels. Run and fight for your life to reach absolution.

name: Guidance
summary:
Guidance is a uniquely meta, and story focused retro RPG.

Players guide verity and her friends on a journey to seal the gateways to the unseen plane and restore reality to it's former state.

name: Gutless
summary: hadopelagic false light / pain is a language that you speak well enough

name: Guns 4 Hire
summary: There are an estimated seven billion people on Earth, a hundred million black market weapons, ten million bad guys, and against it all... four money-hungry mercs! Command the toughest squad in the world while taking on crime lords and corrupt dictators in this ruthless bullet-fest!

name: Gutter: The Cursed
summary: Gutter is a 2D RPG set in a lawless, post-apocalyptic, hyper-industrialized gutter, where desperate people, demons, and robots struggle to survive.

name: Gundam Conquest
summary:
The powerful collaboration between the nationally beloved robot anime "Mobile Suit Gundam" and the popular smartphone game "Kingdom Conquest," which has achieved over 5 million downloads (※), has finally come to fruition! This is an online-only game where you can play with tens of thousands of players! Players can play both the simulation part, where you develop colonies and wage war, and the action part, where up to four players can cooperate. Strengthen your forces and aim for victory!

The mobile versions were delisted after mid 2017. The versions' service was ended on October 29, 2018. There is a PS Vita port.

name: Guardian of the Jungle
summary: Guardian of the Jungle is a horizontal clear version of tower Beat'em Game. You need to obtain resources and allocate them reasonably, cultivate the team to grow, allocate ammunition reasonably, and solve monsters with absolute firepower. It is a pleasant game

name: Gum Ball Run
summary: Gum Ball Run is a free to play fast paced 3D platformer with online multiplayer where Gum Balls race against each other through procedurally generated obstacle courses to become the #1 Gum Ball in the Gummieverse!

name: Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie
summary: Gundham Tanaka, the Supreme Overlord of Ice, awakens one morning to embark on a quest. A truly calamitous quest for one of the greatest treasures known to the nine realms - coochie.

name: GunShy
summary: A Classic Mac version of Shanghai Solitaire, Mahjong Solitaire & Shisen-sho.

name: Gudetama Tamagotchi
summary: The Gudetama Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Sanrio character Gudetama.

name: Gun King
summary: Take down hordes of chess pieces to survive and be crowned Gun King. First choose from over 14 guns. Then level up to mix and match a variety of upgrades to create your very own build.

name: Guardians of Elderon
summary:
Guardians of Elderon is a free-to-play combat-focused base builder game.

Here you get to create your very own fantasy base, summon powerful guardians, go on unique quests and attack the base of other players to become the greatest summoner in Elderon !

name: Guessmoji
summary: The game creator chooses the emoji categories, the grid size, the score to win and the lives of each players.

name: Gunslinger Nova
summary: A top-down, 2d space-shooter that pits the user against swarms of alien ships from other dimensions. Destroy all enemies and portals as fast as possible. Battle increasingly tougher enemies through 40 Campaign levels and Endless Mode!

name: Guess the Celebrity
summary: Are you interested in famous people? You’ve found the right game for you! Do you think you know celebrities better than others? Let's see if you can prove it!

name: Gunwatch: Conflict Survival
summary: 1-16 Player combat zone & 1-4 Player coop Zombie Wave Survival in Comic style. Singleplayer and Multiplayer Playthrough. Get ready for Gunwatch: Conflict Survival!

name: Guess the Movie Game
summary: Watch 10 seconds video and guess the movie!

name: Guess the Line
summary: The game where AI judges your drawing skills.

name: Guntner
summary:
Rescue the sickly life of a dingle whilst surviving high octane shoot ‘em up arcade action. Chauffeur the visibly distraught alien’s ailing pet through a wormhole shortcut colloquially known as “the 13th dimension”. Test your mettle, wits, and lightning trigger reflexes against various and sundry subconscious projections. It is a race against time!
Save the dingle!

name: Gun Fever
summary:
A game based on the popular cartoon series named Gun Fever.

The Wild West is covered by a terrible epidemic. Indians, cowboys and settlers are suffering from it. This disease is called "Revolver Fever." Shoot first, or lie in a coffin!

Lots of adventures await you in the role of the character of the game. He came from the cartoon and looks too cheerful for the Wild West. Naturally, bandits and other moral monsters, like the evil sheriffs, do not like it. But you have a true Colt, while your Colt has bullets!

name: Guacomole
summary: GUACOMOLE is a classic arcade shooter with a twist... Survive endless waves of chip enemies with only one bullet. A seamless cross between classics such as Pong and Asteroids. Enjoy a challenging and strategical experience that will leave you hungry for more!

name: Guns & Fishes
summary: Guns and Fishes is a fast-paced action platform game that uses fishes as ammo for fighting various enemies. Help Diver to fight against the evil shark yakuza who wants to steal all the corals for their magical powers. Fight your foes with various weapons and advance through the map with your skills

name: Guts 'n Grunts
summary: Inspired by games like Contra and Turrican, Guts 'n Grunts is a mid-paced action game with lots of shooting, swimming, and rolling. Find power-ups. Earn upgrades. Fight for pig freedom!

name: Gunforged
summary: Gunforged is a fantasy roguelite shooter where you construct powerful and unique builds every run. Forge your dual guns from a huge number of randomized parts and acquire game-changing abilities to create the ultimate monster-slaying hero.

name: Gurei
summary: An action platformer where you face challenging enemies inspired by Japanese mythology and acquire their powers. Choose your fights in any order, knowing that each opponent gets stronger as the game progresses!

name: Guilt
summary: A beautiful first-person narrative short story set after your death. Immerse yourself in a mind-blowing world as you face a traumatic event from your past.

name: Gus & Stella's Stellar Adventure
summary: Help Gus find out where his family is, and who was behind the attack that left his ear bitten off. Craft, Climb, Solve Puzzles, Win Battles, and Get to know the Cats at the Kitten Intergalactic Taskforce station!

name: GunSpectre
summary: GunSpectre is a twin-stick adventure game featuring a large open world, an equally sized subsurface, and a ton of action!

name: Gunpowder Punk
summary:
Gunpowder Punk is a game in pixel art cyberpunk world. You play as unnamed hero who fights against hordes of psycho gangers and their bosses.
Game made by single person.

name: Guroku Rainbow
summary:
Guroku Rainbow is the successor to the popular Guroku game, which is expanded with new types of stones, bringing even more gameplay possibilities and even more interesting puzzles to solve.
The player moves colored stones around the game grid, which determines the directions in which a stone can move at a given position. His goal is to get the individual stones to the target square of the same color. Each time the player moves a stone in a chosen direction, that stone does not stop moving until it hits another stone or arrives at a position on the game grid from which it is no longer allowed to move in that direction. This principle forces players to devise clever solutions, such as strategically placing other stones in such places that the moving stone stops where it is needed.
This unique game mechanic, which won the original Guroku so many fans around the world with its originality, is expanded in the new Guroku Rainbow with two new types of stones.

name: Gutchan Bank
summary:
In this arcade game for the home, developed by Jun Amanai & Yoshinori Kawamoto for Oh!FM magazine, it's time to get the biggest payday ever. Scour a multi-screen world for as much currency as you can find, then cash it all in at the bank before the day's over! Both the FM-7 and later PC-88 cassette releases also have a hidden sound test.

You play as either Gutchan or his girlfriend Marichan, collecting coins and cash bags, as well as credit and ID cards. Take care to dodge others on the map, all of whom are also collecting these items. They'll even stun and/or steal money from you! If you pick up a bag with a question mark on it, you'll get a power-up that lets you disable one of these enemies.

name: Gunlocked: The 2nd Gunning
summary: A sci-fi action roguelike in space. Gunlocked is a twin stick shooter without the twin stick. Choose from multiple unique characters, dodge enemies, equip powerful upgrades, fight huge bosses, and drink your morning coffee with your free hand. Then do it all again for a brand new experience.

name: Gummy Dummy Battles
summary:
Gummy Dummy Battles is the craziest battle simulator in the history of video games!
Once the fight begins, you can stand and watch as a spectator or take the field and fight in the first or third person.

Although the units are quite unconventional, each has its own strategic role: to dominate the enemy, you must discover their strengths and weaknesses.

name: Guitar Praise: Stryper
summary: An expansion pack for Guitar Praise featuring 25 tracks from the band Stryper, commemorating the band's 25th anniversary.

name: Guitar Praise: Expansion Pack 1
summary: The first expansion pack for Guitar Praise, featuring 25 new songs from artists such as tobyMac, Audio Adrenaline, Sanctus Real, Lincoln Brewster, Stryper, and more.

name: Gunster: Rain of Bullets
summary:
Gunster: Rain of Bullets was a 2D multiplayer action video game, created by Korean-based company NHN who in turn hosted the game using the North American portal named ijji. One other version of Gunster exists, named Gunstriker: Reloaded Bullets and is hosted at Hangame Japan.

Gunster: Rain of Bullets is a port from a Korean game of the same name and was hosted directly by Hangame, which both localizations were shut down. Minor differences exist between the two localizations, but the biggest difference is that they are managed independently of one another.

name: GunSuit Guardians
summary: Gear up your GunSuit and defend Earth from an alien siege! Equip and upgrade unique arsenals of overpowered weapons to survive overwhelming numbers in this action-roguelite twin-stick horde survival.

name: Gunkprotocol
summary: Gunkprotocol is a small top-down exploration game.

name: GunLives Shooting
summary:
Casual shooting game for smartphone!
Can you survive 3 minutes?

name: Guardian of Dynamite: A Bomb Protector
summary: It is a puzzle-type mini-game that slows down the time bomb in the dynamite barrel with simple key operations, simple mathematical formulas, and key input, and endures until the time the bomb is dismantled. Will you be able to save the city by holding out until the time to defuse the bomb?

name: Gutterbrawlers
summary: Gutterbrawlers is a snappy 2D fighting game with a combat system inspired by early Klassics. Featuring online mode with rollback netcode implemented using GGPO open-source code.

name: GunFu Deadlands
summary: GunFu Deadlands is a super hard retro styled indie game. You play a wild west guy, and have to kill all the bad guys on each of 10 levels.

name: Guitar Hero 64
summary: Ever wanted to play Guitar Hero in a Super Mario 64 hack? Probably not, but here it is anyway.

name: Guardians Survival
summary: Survive against waves of attackers in this roguelike survival shoot em up tower defence. Fight for survival, pick your guardian and choose from powerful upgrade paths. Is there enough time to survive and activate the portal before the timer runs out?

name: Guilty Parade: Episode 4
summary: The fourth episode of the interactive visual novel with Point & Click elements Guilty Parade.

name: Guild Saga: Vanished Worlds
summary: As a newcomer to the Heroes Guild, you were inexplicably chosen for a mission of grave importance, much to the chagrin of your seniors. Unravel the mystery as you make your way towards the Andra, an unchartered continent in the west brimming with danger and opportunity.

name: Gunship
summary: Really short game of Gunship. Experience the thrill of being part of a powerful military aircraft in Gunship. With advanced weapons and technology at your disposal, take down enemy targets.

name: Guerrière Lyewärd
summary: After World War III, humans have finally achieved world peace - or so they thought. Malevolent aliens have infected the human organism in a most treacherous way possible, turning young and pretty women into rampaging, violent nymphomaniacs. Only one person can stop the insanity - the attractive secret agent with the codename Lyewärd. Guerrière Lyewärd is a side-scrolling beat-em-up. The gameplay is very simple: the player moves the protagonist through strictly linear stages from left to right, each containing a few types of female enemies that attack the heroine from both sides. The secret agent can punch, kick, and jump. Power-ups such as health-restoring hearts and invincibility appear at set points during the stages, floating in the air. Each stage culminates with a boss battle against a powerful female enemy; defeating the boss leads to a lesbian sex scene.

name: Gunfield
summary: Gunfield - A game that combines genres: shoot 'em up, roguelite and bullet heaven. Destroy hordes of alien ships and giant bosses, unlock and upgrade new weapons and abilities.

name: Gus and Jaq's Cooking Chaos
summary: The player controls Gus and Jaq, who are holding a giant cake, to collect falling toppings for the cake. Later hacked to create Cooking Chaos.

name: Gus's Feed Sort
summary: Another Soukoban clone. Later hacked to create Feed Sort, which is nearly identical to the original.

name: Guinea Pig Bridge!
summary:
Guide a group of gullible guineas through a gauntlet of gizmos! Use the power of physics to propel, fling, and bounce them to safety!
Featuring an original soundtrack by Parry Gripp, Guinea Pig Bridge! is a whimsical puzzle game that will send you into cute overload. Each level is a lovingly crafted, fully 3D environment full of piggy perils. As the game progresses, you’ll unlock different types of bridge blocks that guineas can interact with in different (and often hilarious) ways. But only the right combination will get them safely from point A to point B, so you’ll have to experiment! Trial and error has never been more adorable—or more derpy—than this.

name: Guitar Legend: Get on Stage!
summary: Jumpstart your international career as a rock star by playing in front of fired-up audiences in the most prestigious concert halls.. but watch out for the wrong notes!

name: Guild Keeper
summary: Lead a Guild of Heroes in this party-based RPG with realistic battle mechanics and strategic elements. Explore challenging dungeons. Build your base. Trade, craft and enchant items. The fate of your Guild is in your hands.

name: Gun: Showdown
summary: GUN Showdown puts players in the role of Colton White, a vengeful gunslinger making his way through the untamed West of the late-1800s where the lines between good and evil are blurred and greed, lust and brutality were a way of life. The game features all of the action contained in the console versions, as well as all-new side missions, quick-play modes, multiplayer modes and gameplay features that are unique to the PSP system.

name: Gun
summary: The main storyline, written by Hollywood screenwriter Randall Jahnson (The Mask of Zorro, 1998,) is linear. You will have to fight duels, defend towns against bandits, help build railway tracks, intervene in various conflicts, and kill heavily-armed bossed. There are also many side missions or alternative ways to earn money. You can play poker in the casino, help out farmers with their livestock, assist the local sheriff, or deliver items with the pony express. Other possibilities include bounty hunting, regular hunting for rare animals, mining for gold, and various rescue missions.

name: Guest Uncovered
summary: A survival horror game of "Whodunnit" where 4-12 players have been invited to a party as guests, but not every guest is who they say they are. Use your deduction skills to uncover the killers in your midst while escaping their grasp till you can find a way to escape with your life.

name: Gunslinger
summary: Gunslinger is an unreleased action adventure set in the old west, that was in development by Surreal Software in 2001 / 2002 for the Playstation 2.

name: Gun and Girl
summary: Experience the combination of shooting and puzzle elements

name: Gundroid
summary: Earth is in danger in this classic Run N' Gun action spectacle inspired by the glory days of gaming from the late 80s and 90s! Take control of G.U.N.N.R and and battle your way through hordes of enemies and boss fights accompanied by a rocking soundtrack.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 7: Sin Kiske
summary: Adds Sin Kiske to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 8: Bedman?
summary: Adds Bedman? to the roster of playable characters.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 9: Asuka R♯
summary: Adds Asuka R♯ to the roster of playable characters

name: GunGuru
summary: A game made by a real world US Marine Veteran Machine-gunner. Explore the ever evolving jungle of GunGuru, an ancient procedurally generated environment, full of magic and mystery. Unlock the secret of the Runes and find out what is hidden beneath.

name: Gunfight
summary: Gunfight is an unofficial port of the classic Atari VCS game where a cowboy at either side of the screen, moving up and down for the Sinclair ZX81.

name: Guitar Hero 7
summary: Guitar Hero 7 is a cancelled 7th entry in the Guitar Hero series.

name: Gulch Guardians
summary: cute + tough card tactics autobattles

name: Gunslinger Girl Volume III
summary: Gunslinger Girl Volume III is an Adventure game, published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Gunmetal Gothic
summary: A co-op shooter-RPG with a retro-3D aesthetic. Customize and upgrade your character as you take back the city of Vestige from demonic machines!

name: Guards II: Chaos in Hell
summary: There is chaos in Hell. Drive a group of heroes through five different underworlds. Survive against tons of evil creatures in amusing turn-based combat to find and face the Devil!

name: Gun to the Zone
summary: Find powerful weapons, fight monsters and discover the secrets of the Zone. Each weapon is different.

name: Guilty Me
summary: In Guilty Me, take the role of Lucy on a scary nighttime journey home from the coffee shop. Face psychological terror, explore a dark environment, and uncover hidden secrets. Survive the chase and immerse yourself in a gripping walk simulator of suspense.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack
summary: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters as well as the 5 characters from Season Pass 1 as they were released, for a total of 20 characters. There are 5 colors for every character, making for 100 extra colors available.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Special Colors for Sol and Ky
summary:
This early purchase reward unlocked color and effect swapped versions of Sol Badguy and Ky Kiske.

The pack was available for purchases on PlayStation and Steam from release till June 25th and on Xbox from release till April 13th. Physical versions received a single use code while supplies lasted.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Another Story
summary:
This story expansion is exclusive to Season Pass 1.

Another Story provides the player a full look behind the curtain from another perspective featuring appearances from many characters who did not show up during the main story, including Ramlethal, May, and Baiken.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Lap of the Kami
summary: The additional battle stage "Lap of the Kami" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: White House Reborn
summary: The additional battle stage "White House Reborn" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Fairy's Forest Factory
summary: The additional battle stage "Fairy's Forest Factory" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Tír na nÓg
summary: The additional battle stage "Tír na nÓg" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Gun Jam VR
summary: GUN JAM is a rhythm FPS where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features a unique beat-pattern shooting mechanic and firefights synced to the original soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 1
summary: The first Season Pass for Guilty Gear Strive includes 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the base roster of 15 characters along with the 5 new characters in this pass.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive + Season Pass 1
summary:
This bundle includes the base game Guilty Gear Strive and it;s first Season Pass which adds 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the 20 characters available with this package.

Original released as the Deluxe Edition for Guilty Gear Strive, this bundle was renamed along with a price change and the announcement of a new bundle, Ultimate Edition 2022.
Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack 2
summary: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 2 (total of 24 colors).

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 2
summary: Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a color pack with 6 variations for the new characters.

name: Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure
summary: A new chapter unfolds in Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure, the fourth expansion for the award-winning MMORPG Guild Wars 2. Soar through the skies to combat the strange and otherworldly forces emerging through rifts to devastate Tyria. The adventure continues through three major story and content releases to follow. A self-contained story with its own resolution will play out at launch. Later releases will seamlessly pick up where the launch arc concluded and tell the rest of the expansion's story. Additional features and updates across the game are planned for release every quarter.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Contents Kit
summary:
The Ultimate Edition Content Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Special Colors. All included content is exclusive to this package.
The physical Ultimate Edition release came with a single-use code for this content.

The Ultimate Edition Special Colors include the 5 characters in Season Pass 1 along with the 15 in the initial roster. The 4 characters added in Season Pass 2 get this color variation as part of Additional Color Pack 2.

The soundtrack includes a total of 55 songs, featuring more than 15 vocal themes and 40 background tracks used in the Story Mode.

The Artwork includes various art and visuals from the Guilty Gear series’ history including the main visuals of each game and a number of unreleased illustrations from renowned guest artists.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition 2022
summary:
Ultimate Edition 2022 includes the base game (Guilty Gear -Strive-), Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2 and the Ultimate Edition Contents Kit.
Early purchasers of the Xbox releases, from release till April 13th, also got the exclusive Special Colors for Sol and Ky.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.

Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and the Additional Character Color Pack 2 which adds 6 color variations for the 4 characters added in Season Pass 2.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.
A color variant in Additional Character Color Pack 2 matches the Ultimate Edition Special Colors for Season Pass 2 characters.

Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Guardian Goddess
summary: We are recruiting gamers from the World Government! Control an immortal Guardian to destroy enemies and grow indefinitely!

name: Guess the Movie: Quiz Game
summary:
Do you remember posters of your favorite movies? Will you guess what the film is in front of you by the actors on the poster? Will you remember the name of the cartoon character on the image?

This quiz is a real catch for any cinephile! 750 movies, cartoons and TV series, 50 interesting levels, classic movies and current movies of different genres and countries of production — all are in one application.

name: Gunnery Cell
summary: This is a Rogue bullet shooting game, you will play a resurrected cell in the arena, use the unique weapons you get, use the purest violence to kill the enemies in the arena and survive, collect energy to make yourself stronger, until finally incarnate as a god!

name: Gutasaga
summary: Gutasaga - 2D Strategy RPG pre-viking era game. Immerse yourself in the 550 - 600 AD saga. Be the Viking who opened trade routes with Constantinople. Encounter over 40 nations with unique cultures on your journey. Succeed in trading 205 historically recreated goods. Or try raids and piracy.

name: Gutter: The Reject
summary: Play the role of a failed experiment in this hazardous new mini-campaign.

name: Gunslinger Express
summary: Defend a moving train against relentless bandit attacks. Shoot enemies, repair wagons and upgrade your character as you explore diverse regions each with unique guns, enemies and upgrades.

name: Guilded
summary: Manage a fantasy adventurer's guild and make a lot of money... I mean save the kingdom from a looming threat! Recruit heroes, create quests to send them on and upgrade your guild's facilities.

name: Guardians
summary: Guardians, an extraordinary action role-playing game that transports you to a captivating universe teeming with danger, discovery, and heroism. Immerse yourself in a sprawling, post-apocalyptic world where chaos-infected creatures roam, and the fate of civilization rests on your shoulders.

name: Guerra Sangrenta
summary: “Guerra Sangrenta” has many attracting game modes, with its unique optimization technique, such as Classic Competition, Casual Game, Adventure mode etc. Join to find all the wild gears and weapons for your taste, run through the storm of shots and shells. Exciting battles await you!

name: Guncade
summary: Guncade is a 1980's arcade lovers dream, if that dream also involves being an arms dealer to grannies, clowns, and other suspicious people. Journey through this visual novel and decide who to cater to and who can buzz off.

name: Gudetama Tap! Puzzle
summary: A mobile puzzle adventure game.

name: Gun Trails
summary: Gun Trails is an overhead shooter inspired by genre classics. Players must shoot down enemies while dodging dense waves of bullets, but are able to make use of a hyper laser by building up long combos of enemies.

name: Gunner 3
summary:
Gunner 3 is a very challenging 2d shooter, set in the forests of South America where rumours have been heard that in area 6B they are experimenting with mutants and weapons, your mission is to stop them and destroy all the soldiers enemies.
This game was developed by KNPMASTER in 2000, this is a remaster for modern systems. Created completely in the Unity Engine and with various improvements such as full screen (16: 9), improved HUD, more detailed clouds, new difficulty levels,...

name: G-ump
summary: Do you have what it takes to complete the level and make it to the end, jumping and completing different obstacles? It's simple, you have to double jump to be able to complete all the parkour, good luck jumper

name: Guns and Donuts
summary: Donuts! and Guns!? Choose from a host of Donut! characters (each with multiple unique Guns!) and traverse wonderfully large locations in search for more Donut! companions. Fight through hordes of miscellaneous enemies by using either your Guns!, your Donuts!, or your puzzle solving skills!

name: Gunship
summary:
Our nation is under attack by enemy forces and the defense can only succeed with the help of air ground support. The future of our nation depends on you! Fight your way through five missions to repel the attack and restore peace.

Gunship is a rail shooter for the Nintendo Game Boy. Fight your way through five action-packed missions as you try to repel the attack and restore peace.

name: Guitar Hero Carabiner
summary: Guitar Hero Carabiner is a handheld LCD game based on the Guitar Hero series.

name: Gunsmoke
summary: Gunsmoke is a shooter game. The goal of the player is to eliminate all the gunmen that appear in the screen.

name: Gubbins
summary: Gubbins is a friendly puzzle game where you place tiles to construct words, with the help and hindrance from weird little pals called Gubbins. Minimalist typography alongside mischievous cartoons serve as a kooky canvas for moreish wordplay. It’s essentially Solitaire meets Scrabble with hilarious friends wreaking havoc.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 10: Johnny
summary: This allows the character "Johnny" to be used in-game.

name: Guardian: Planet Defense
summary: Take command of an orbiting defense satellite in this action-packed planetary defense shooter. Blast away at waves of incoming asteroids and crafty aliens before they destroy your planet. Scavenge powerful weapons from vanquished alien ships and turn them against your foes. How long can you survive?

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Daredevil Edition
summary:
The Daredevil Edition of Guilty Gear -Strive- includes the base game, Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2, Season Pass 3, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters announced with its release.

Season Pass 2 and 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a Color Pack which unlocks 6 color variations for the 4 characters in the related pass. Season Pass 3 also has an exclusive Color Pack with 3 additional color variations for its characters that missed both 25th Anniversary Color Packs.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1. A color variant in the Season Pass 2 and 3 Color Packs matches the Ultimate Edition color variation for their characters.

The Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary Special Additional Color Pack unlocks 2 color variations for the 24 characters available at the end of Season Pass 2.

name: Gulf Echoes: Tent of Treason
summary: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Guidelicious
summary: A short, interactive visual novel about waking up in a strange room with a mysterious man. But why are you here? Let Him be your Guide to the truth.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Appreciation Color Pack
summary: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There is 1 color for every character, making for 24 extra colors available.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack
summary: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There are 2 colors for every character, making for 48 extra colors available.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season 3 Character Additional Colors
summary: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 3 (total of 24 colors).

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 3
summary:
An exciting season pass that includes 4 additional playable characters, stages and season 3 pass bonus character colors as additional DLC for the Guilty Gear -Strive- game.

Season Pass 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and 2 color packs for the new characters. The first pack unlocks 6 color variations, including the ultimate edition colors, and the exclusive second pack unlocks extra colors 13-15, which are the 3 anniversary color variations.

name: Guitar Hero III Mobile: Song Pack 1
summary:
Guitar Hero III Song Pack 1 (Stylized GH3SP1) is a Standalone version of the Guitar Hero III Mobile Port of the game. This version came with new songs and achievements maintaining the same graphics.
The game was developed by Hands On and published by Activision.

name: Gulf Echoes: Memories of the Past
summary: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Guilty: Ashlar
summary: This is an easy to get started role-playing, adventure and exploration single player game that tells the exciting story of several criminals who experience adventures in a desolate and forbidden world.

name: Guardians Of Gaia: Guardians 8
summary: Guardians of Gaia: Guardians 8 is an introduction to the combat and game mechanics of Guardians of Gaia. Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: GunMaster
summary: GunMaster is an obscure Arcade Action Game developed by Metro Corporation (creators of the latter Bust a Groove) in December 1994. The game was influenced by the earlier Gunstar Heroes from Treasure, but with some Fighting Game and Beat 'em Up mechanics included.

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle
summary:
Gunvolt Records Cychronicle is a new rhythm music game starring the songstresses of the Azure Striker Gunvolt series, Lumen, Lola, and Luxia singing 15 different songs.
Follow the notes to the pounding beat and aim for a top score in this electrifying rhythm game!
The dual analog controls sync with the characters dancing in the 3D backgrounds for a fully immersive experience.

name: GunRun
summary: Kill lots of things. Like. A LOT.

name: Guards!
summary: Guards! is a 1-4 player coop fantasy FPS that puts you in the under-funded and over-zealous steel boots of the City Watch. Kick down doors, bust criminals and cause excessive property damage as you fight to restore law and order to the corrupt city of New Alestead.

name: Guitar Jam
summary: Namco arcade cabinet released in 1999, only in Japan. Distinctive for its guitar-centric gameplay and controller, Namco was sued by Konami over its striking similarities to GuitarFreaks and most cabinets were converted. It is considered extremely rare to find an unaltered Guitar Jam cabinet in the modern-day, much less a working one.

name: Guardian Untold
summary: Guardian Untold is a top-down, defense adventure with 1-2 player co-op. Gather resources, restore your village, and stand against the creatures lurking within the Unknown.

name: Guitar Star
summary: A plug-and-play console designed to capitalize on the boom of games like Guitar Hero and Rock Band, manufactured and released sometime in 2009. It contains licensed MIDI versions of various rock songs like 'Dream Police' (Cheap Trick) and 'Thriller' (Fall Out Boy), and four modes from which to play them in. It has garnered a reputation for being a rather poor representation of the 'guitar game' subtype, often pointing to the lackluster covers and low production quality.

name: Guildford Castle VR
summary: Guildford Castle is a free roaming, narrative VR experience with light interactivity.

name: Guessr.tv
summary: Guess the view count. You will be presented with a random Twitch stream and you have to guess how many viewers they have.

name: Gulag
summary:
A five-level wad for Heretic, incorporating numerous new graphics. The appearance of each level is quite different; there is no unifying theme except that the action takes place on a series of islands.
1) On the Beach
2) Subterranea
3) Skull Mountain
4) The Flying Dutchman
5) Circus Maximus

name: Gunman Contracts: Stand Alone
summary: "Gunman Contracts - Stand Alone" is an action-movie inspired shooter playable both in VR and in Non-VR (First Person). As a professional hitman, the player takes on ruthless forces in the criminal underworld, bringing justice and order in the world beyond the reach of law - one contract at a time.

name: GunViper
summary: A freeware 2.5D vertical scrolling shoot 'em up developed by M.Nagahashi from Japan.

name: Gunslinger Duel
summary: Engage in turn-based quick draw battles against increasingly formidable opponents. Choose your next move, then in third person, draw and fire before your opponent does! An arcade-style strategy game in the Wild West. Are you a real gunslinger survivor, or another yellow-belly about to hit the dirt?

name: GunDeck 100
summary: GunDeck 100 is a lightning-fast twin-stick shooter where you’ll build your arsenal from randomly-dealt cards. Weapons fire in a rainbow of elements with unique effects. Dart and dodge to survive the fireworks unleashed against you, and retaliate with your own display! Can you survive to wave 100?

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition
summary: Unique third-person shooter action game just made comeback to Nintendo Switch. Become Grave, a resurrected gunslinger and ruthless anti-hero, and rain down bullets on your enemies.

name: Guardian Maia
summary: Guardian Maia is a 3rd person action-adventure game set in 2750 where the world of science fiction and traditional Indigenous Māori culture collide. Journey across New Zealand’s unforgiving South Island fighting ruthless warriors to find three kete (baskets) which hold the key to saving your people.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Artisan and Magician
summary: Two new heroes will join your adventure. You can choose to either strategically command the power of the star card or summon a mecha to fight alongside you. At the same time, they also bring four new weapons, including a submachine gun, a compass, an squid, and... a brick that conceals subtle golden sheen.

name: Gunrox
summary: Gunrox is a free to play multiplayer browser based online strategy game, where you control a squad of soldiers and battle with other players from around the world in turn-based combat. In Gunrox, the main objective is to outwit your opponent with your own squad of three units against other players from around the world. Duke it out in vibrant locales, ranging from junkyards to city streets, each with its own unique colorful landscapes. With so much to offer, Gunrox is a unique experience that may get you addicted in the good kind of way!

name: Guncotton
summary: Guncotton is an industrial/base styled two map pack (and start map). Architecturally very detailed, the maps are woven in modified Q2 Waste textures (MXoxide) and Than's Industrial set.

name: Guns of Succubus 2
summary: A boy named "Cain" has lost his memories. Join him and the musket-wielding succubus maid "Grenadier" as you shoot your way through hordes of diverse monster girls! Can he safely recover his memories and return to his happy days? That's entirely up to the choices you, the player, make!

name: Guild of Rogues
summary: Guild of Rogues is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with Autobattler elements. Strategically build your team of minions to create amazing synergies and defeat all enemies!

name: Guess The Movie
summary: Guess the movies, TV shows & cartoons with the best movie quiz! Great trivia game about movies!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Young Gun Grave
Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Time Limited
Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Character Pass
Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Deluxe Edition
Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Harry Macdowel
Guitar Hero: Brazucas
summary: Modified version of Guitar Hero III that features songs from Brazilian bands, such as Capital Inicial, Pitty, Charlie Brown Jr. and Mamonas Assassinas.

name: GuardGrave
summary: GuardGrave is an old school styled game in the vein of BurgerTime. Players must close the coffins on each stage before the sun comes up. 7 Worlds, 7 Bosses and 37 Stages of co-op monster bashing mayhem!

name: Guncho
summary:
Bandits are taking over the town and you're the only gunslinger around that can stop them. Battle through 5 bandit camps in this turn based rogue-like western to win the lucrative bounty or die trying.

This game is a PICO-8 version of Guncho, a 7DRL gamejam game. The original is made by Arnold Rauers and Terri Vellman.

name: GuildMestar
summary: Control, defend, and manage a guildhall in this fantasy, party based, card battler with a heavy focus on trading. Your journey will take you through many procedural generated dungeons on your quest for power.

name: Gu-L
summary:
While on the road during a school trip, a class becomes stranded in the middle of a derelict forest when their bus abruptly crashes. Fending for themselves, they soon come across a mansion whose lone habitant is a stoic maid. Seeking shelter, they take refuge in the mansion, only for the stay to be anything but restful.

This surreal RPG-Maker horror game was a submission in the March 2001 edition of the monthly contest that Enterbrain would host. Gu-L won first place, with Hyogo's very own Yubu Yakushiro receiving 30,000円 as the prize.

name: Guess the Word
summary: Guess the 5-letter word in the 5 tries. If you don't, then you don't. You can try again.

name: Guardians of Eden
summary: "Guardians of Eden": a tower defense cultivation game where you serve Valkyries, meeting their needs, and showcase strategic skills in battles by placing them strategically and allocating resources for success.

name: Guàishòu
summary: Survive a derelict city overgrown by jungle and filled with grotesques mutants lurking in the dark. Use your lighting gun to see it through.

name: Gun Fighting
summary: Gunfighting is a first-person shooter game with a 1v1 simulated combat training concept that takes into account confined environments, such as inside a building, to confront the enemy.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 11: Elphelt Valentine
summary: Elphelt is joining Guilty Gear: Strive!

name: Guns'N'Wheels
summary: Fast cars with big guns. Customisable, Arena Based, Vehicular Combat. Play Singleplayer story mode or compete in Multiplayer high skill battles, unlocking arenas, cars and decals. Rank up to be crowned a Legend. Play in Single player, Online PvP or Split screen.

name: Gunpunk VR
summary: Are you ready to perform for us? Grab your guns, Dive into our dungeon, and Endure the Desires of the Audience. Will you accept their challenges? Or Defy them, and risk their rage? Never forget: "Entertainment is Everything"

name: Guns & Draguns
summary: Experience the thrill of teamwork and competition in Guns And Draguns, a roguelite shooting game. Navigate through a perilous fantasy dungeon, defeat enemies together, and gather upgrades to defeat the final boss. But don't trust your friends too much; you all aim to be the best player!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Quartz
Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Yensen The Boostmaster
Guru-guru Garacters
summary: GuruGuru Garacters is a Role-Playing game, developed by Multimedia Intelligence Transfer and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Guru-guru Town Hanamaru-kun
summary: GBC version of the picture book "Hanamaru-kun" for young children. Educational software that allows you to learn the knowledge you need in your daily life through games such as errands, hideouts, and shiritori. You can enjoy the story as if you were watching a TV program, and you can study without knowing it.

name: Gute Zeiten Schlechte Zeiten Quiz
summary: Gute Zeiten Schlechte Zeiten Quiz is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Software 2000, which was released in Europe in 2000.

name: Gus Goes to Cybertown
summary:
This educational game is aimed at kids under eight. You are playing as the dog Gus who searches the town after his 15 "CyberBuds".

The town consists of four houses and one park. In every house you encounter a puzzle-based educational game. This includes a spelling game, and game where you have to recognize letters to avoid asteroids. Also you have to count the bubbles in an aquarium or recognize and match shapes.

In the park you can see typical clothes and items from different timelines starting at the neanderthals up to spacemen. There are also a few songs included.

name: Gus and the Cyberbuds: Sing, Play & Paint-A-Long
summary:
Gus and the Cyberbuds: Sing, Play & Paint-A-Long is an educational music game for children between three and eight. It features six songs (Animal Shenanigans, Down by the Bay, Imagination, The Ants Go Marching, Old MacDonald's Farm and I Am A Fine Musician) with three game modes:

Sing: The song is played and is accompanied by an animation. The lyrics are also shown, karaoke-style, so the player can sing along.
Play: The player can add a variety of icons (e.g. animals, trees, etc.) to the background. When playing the song, those icons stay on the screen.
Paint: The player can use simple painting tools to paint over the background while the song is optionally playing in the background.

name: Guntouchables
summary: Guntouchables is a 1-4 player co-op survivor-like shooter. The world has fallen and is overrun by an endless horde of ever-evolving mutants. You and your ragtag group of gun runners must find and deliver crates of classified military supplies before the enemy can take advantage of their content.

name: Gus and the Cyberbuds: Stellar Game Center!
summary:
Gus and the Cyberbuds: Stellar Game Center! is a collection of six mini-games divided into four sections:

Clam-o-Rama: a Concentration variant with sea animals.
Create a Creature: The player can choose various facial features and clothing to create a face.
The Write Stuff: the player has to complete a partially written letter by dragging icons on the blank parts. There are no right or wrong choices.

The last section, Melody Madness, evolved around numbered bottles which are filled with different amounts of water. The three mini-games are: - Clicking on the correct bottles (the correct numbers are written out) to re-create a song. Alternatively the player can use the bottles freely to create a new melody. - A Simon Says variant. - Filling the bottles with the correct amount of water in order to match the given music notes.

All mini-games were already included in previous entries of the series.

name: Guardian
summary: Guardian is an arcade action game for one or two players. In an intergalactic war, an enemy ship called Dromeda is attacking your home planets and you need to defend them! The planets are located at either the top or the bottom of the screen, and are defended by a shield. Dromeda is in the middle of the screen, and will be launching explosive devices at the planets. You control a spaceship which is the last hope to save the planets. Unfortunately, your ships lasers are unable to reach Dromeda, so you you must shoot the explosives as they come in. If you miss any explosives, they will destroy part of the shield. If a large enough hole forms, an explosive could get through and destroy an entire planet. The game ends when all of your planets have been destroyed.

name: Guardian Frame: Debrief!
summary: Guardian Frame: Debrief! is a lighthearted, low-intensity dress-up game about two girls in love: a giant robot, and the engineer that pilots and maintains her.

name: Guru Guru Onsen 2
summary: Guru Guru Onsen 2 (ぐるぐる温泉２) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast and Windows PCs, the Windows version appropriately being titled Guru Guru Onsen 2 for Windows (ぐるぐる温泉２ for Windows).

name: Guru Guru Onsen 3
summary: Guru Guru Onsen 3 (ぐるぐる温泉３) is a table game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Guardian Deity
summary: A boys love mobile game.

name: Guardian Legend
summary: Guardian Legend is a q RPG game. Lovely modelling, nostalgic style of the scene, humorous dialogue, can take you into a relaxed and happy fairy tale world. If you like this style, don't miss it.

name: Guitar Maker
summary: In the game "GuitarMaker" you play the role of a guitar craftsman. Build unique electric guitars. Develop your skills, choose the best wood and components, body shapes, varnish them and select electronics, to create perfect instruments. Gain recognition from customers and open your own music store.

name: Guilty Loving Boxing
summary: A 3D boxing game featuring female! You can also play mixed gender matches! In addition to choosing characters and rules and fighting, you can also watch CPU vs CPU or train without being counterattacked! Enjoy boxing in various costumes and situations! *Note: This is a single-player game only.

name: Guitar Hero II: Deluxe - Brand New Hero
Guinea Pig
summary: Adopt a new pet and embark on this journey to help him find a safe place.

name: Gunsmith Workshop Simulator
summary: Embark on the journey of a seasoned gunsmith in Gunsmith Workshop Simulator. Immerse yourself in the detailed world of firearms customization, where you assemble, modify, and test a diverse range of weapons.

name: Gunstorm
summary: Gunstorm is a space shooter loaded with playability. Wave after wave of alien craft attack your agile ship. Use the mouse to control your ship at the speed of thought in a perfectly balanced game that starts easy and gradually gets more difficult.

name: Guardian: Defense to Others
summary: It's a single-tower defense game that subjugates monsters and clears rounds.

name: Gun Lady
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Gururin World
summary: A plug-and-play game released by EPOCH.

name: Guardian Rock
summary: Using your rock destroy all the archaeologists. Your rock can be moved from left to right or top-down. without stopping.

name: Gumrun
summary: The goal of this jump 'n' run multiplayer racing game is to use the weapons and items in-game to achieve victory and collect the most coins. Those can be spent to unlock new skins and weapons for your next run. You can play online against up to 9 other players or compete with a bunch of your friends in a private session.

name: Guardian of Civilization
summary: In history, many brilliant civilizations faced annihilation due to the invasion of powerful empires, leaving only sighs of regret. In a fictional world, you will take on the role Guardian of Civilization. Can you help these civilizations grow and thrive, resisting the invasion of formidable enemies?

name: Guns n' Souls feat. Song Summoner
summary: A sequel to Song Summoner: The Unsung Heroes. Players control Ziggy once again, who now powers his magic sword with cards representing different characters, each possessing unique musical instruments.

name: Guns n' Angel
summary:
Guns n' Angel is a flash game developed by Ninja Kiwi (which was formerly known as Kaiparasoft when this game was originally developed) and released on February 3, 2009. It's an action platformer game where the player takes control of a gun-slinging girl named Angel who travels across the world to stop an invading alien army.

Although Flash was discontinued on January 12 2021, Guns n' Angel is still playable through BlueMaxima’s Flashpoint, The Supernova Player and The Ninja Kiwi Archive.

name: Guano
summary: Play as a delightfully dumb seagull, find food and complete quests to help free the Grand Masters and gain their powers. Harrass humans and free the Pohemeda Islands from the evil Food Inc. with your powerful poop and loud screams!

name: Gun Gladiator
summary: Brutally defeat your enemies, upgrade your equipment, influence the crowd, master the arena and become the new champion in a gory and fast-paced retro FPS set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Gun vs. Zombies
summary: Gun vs. Zombies is a thrilling showdown where precision meets undead mayhem. Take control of a dynamic gun affected by physics as you fend off waves of zombies hungry for a brain feast. Compete against others on the global leaderboard by showcasing your shooting skills.

name: Gundam Breaker 4
summary: Create your own ultimate Gundam in the newest Gundam Breaker! With more customizable parts than ever before, you finally have the freedom to build your perfect Gunpla. Test it in battle using the brand new dual-weapon system and break parts off of your enemies and add them to your collection.

name: Gunball
summary: Gunball is another lost old Scott Cawthon game made in around 2003. Only 1 old screenshot of the game has been found and from it, it appears to be a space shooter very similar to Scott's other game Stellar Gun. Virtually nothing else is currently known about this game, accept that it was at least a bit bigger than Stellar Gun.

name: GuluGuluLand 3D
summary: A classic action-style, 3D game from the NES era! Unity-chan keeps running and can't stop. Use the actions of grabbing the stick with one hand to turn, and grabbing the stick with both hands to jump, and lead her to clear the stage.

name: Guards!: Vanguard Supporter Pack
summary: JOIN THE VANGUARDShow your support in a show of valor with the Vanguard Supporter Pack. GUARDS! TO ARMS!

name: Guisard Revolution: Bokura wa Omoi wo Mi ni Matou

name: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom

name: Guardian

name: Gunzo!

name: Gug

name: Guardian Goddess
summary: The heroine with a mysterious past gets a job in a store in the underworld. A male doll will help her with this work.

name: Gugong

name: Gun And Sword

name: Gumbowl's Adventure
summary: You play as the main character Gumbowl and have to get your missing gumballs.

summary:
Add 4 Lumen and Joule tracks from the Azure Striker Gunvolt series to GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle!

This song pack adds the tracks "Sakura Efflorescence", "Tabula Rasa" and "Reincarnation Fateful" for Lumen along with "Cyanotype" for Joule.

name: Guardião Tupã
summary: Take on the role of a mysterious warrior in this adventure through Brazilian folklore. Face the dreaded Dry Body, restore balance and save various endangered entities, use your powerful amber arm to throw enemies, travel great distances or discover ancient secrets.

With little to start with, you begin the journey to restore the guild to its former glory by crafting, farming, building and by going on adventures with rogue-lite elements. Can you build a thriving guild and discover the secrets of the old world?

name: Guitar Hero II: Indonesia 2018
summary: Guitar Hero II: Indonesia 2018 is an unlicensed PlayStation 2 game from Indonesia. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero II which adds Indonesian songs.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 12: A.B.A
summary: This allows the character "A.B.A" to be used in-game.

summary: The Elder Dragon Saga—Complete Collection includes the first three expansions: Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns, Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire, and Guild Wars 2: End of Dragons. You'll also receive 5 Living World seasons to continue with your journey between the expansions.

name: Gunstorm II
