summary: Command your group in this medieval fantasy CRPG and unveil the story as you explore dungeons, defend fortresses, protect payloads other different stage objectives!

name: Guild of Guardians
summary: Guild of Guardians is a mobile roguelite Squad RPG where players build their dream team of Guardians and compete in a guild to earn epic, tradable rewards.

name: GunGun: Race Against Time
summary:
Easy To Learn Hard To Master!

Welcome to GunGun - Your Ultimate Gaming Adventure! Redefining gaming excitement with every shot, GunGun is all about the thrill, where every level will test your reflexes and timing to the limit.

name: Gunbot Diplomacy
summary: Splatter slimes, massacre mutants, and assemble your perfect Gunbot! Survive hordes of enemies in this top-down shooter roguelite by customizing your weapons on the unique upgrade grid, and pick from a wide variety of build-defining modules and wacky base bots for a new experience every run.

name: GuardFortressVR
summary: Due to racial differences, battles often break out, and you, as the new king of mankind, are determined to unite the continents and rid the world of war. But only if you accept races from other continents. From then on began the journey of unifying the continent!

name: Guardian Girls: Astral Battle
summary:
The world is attacked by monsters called Astral Spirits. Play as Necta, Mikan, Mao, and Ghina and defend the earth by shooting all the Astral Spirits. Help the girls battle all the astral spirits.

Guardian Girls: Astral Battle is a simple shmup game with a lot of bullets (bullet hell). Player have to dodge the incoming bullets and enemies while shooting and destroy the enemies. You don’t need internet and you can play this game offline.

name: Guardians of the Zodiac
summary: You’re a young college student studying an ancient scroll, which is said to have ties to the Chinese Zodiac. Though it hasn't been opened for centuries, you manage to remove its seal. Before you can read it, a flash of light blinds you and the scroll is stolen from your hands!

name: Gunbird
summary:
Marion and friends battle hard in the sprawling world
of yet another Psikyo shooter masterpiece.
Now with online rankings!

name: Guardian War
summary: In your quest to save the princess, you will encounter challenging boss battles that require strategic planning and skillful execution.

name: Guardians: Unite the Realms
summary: Can you save the Guardians and their Realms?

name: Guardian Angel
summary: Guardian Angel is a short point-and-click narrative game about finding your way through the world on your own.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 13: Slayer
summary: Adds Slayer to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors
summary: The additional battle stage "Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guitar Band: Rock Battle
summary: Guitar Band: Rock Battle is a rhythm game for mobile where you build your band and can challenge other players online.

name: Gulliver in the Land of Giants
summary:
Gulliver in the Land of Giants is a Russian educational game based on the second part of Jonathan Swift's satirical masterpiece best known as "Gulliver's Travels".

The game contains several modes:
- Animated audio book.
- Game (Boy or Girl), 2 different kind of games depending on which gender chosen.
- English lessons for digits or colors.
- Painting book.
- Audio drama, which is the same as animated audio book but with no visuals.

name: Gumball 3000
summary: Gumball 3000 is a racing game based on the real-life 3000 mile rally of the same name that has been running annually since 1999. The full race is a single player game but other races have two player modes.

name: Gun Runners
summary: Blast your way through ever increasing hordes of space bandits and alien creatures in this action roguelite. Level up your character and obtain powerful upgrade items with a variety of effects. Procedurally generated enemy waves and item choices prevent any two runs from playing out the same way.

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 - Special DLC boss "Kohaku Otori" from "COGEN: Sword of Rewind"
Gun Shop 3
summary: Do you like guns? Many people sure do! Gun Shop 3 is a real-time storefront simulator with a sprinkling of first person shooter mechanics on top. Choose your location, design your store, stock the shelves, and then flip that sign to “open for business”! The demand is there. Can you supply it?

name: Gunpowder Massacre
summary: Gunpowder Massacre is a 2D action shooter with Rogue-Lite elements set in a steampunk atmosphere. Play as one of the only survivors after the MP-2000 virus changed the world. Survive the hordes of enemies, defeat as many as you can, and showcase your skills to put your name in the Hall of Fame!

name: Guard the Tower!
summary: A tower defense game filled with 15 varied levels across 7 biomes and 14 unique monsters with 3 increasingly harder difficulties to challenge even the most experienced of tower defense gamers lurking in their strongholds.

name: Gunflow
summary: Use guns to combine elements in surprising ways to unleash powerful reactions. Loot artifacts to build the most unique and godlike builds. Go solo or with your friends up to 4 players.

name: Guns Demons
summary: Get ready to dive into explosive action and pure adrenaline with Guns Demons, the vehicular combat game that redefines the genre. In this thrilling universe, cars don't just race—they're armed with a devastating array of firearms, ready to unleash chaos on the road.

name: Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds
summary: Explore new lands, wield a spear in combat, and test yourself in challenging encounters in Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds. The newest adventure in the world of Tyria will play out over the course of four quarterly releases: a year of content, feature updates, and more.

name: Guardians of The AfterLife
summary: Guardians of the Afterlife is an adventure to reclaim your existence, bridging the mystical divide between the afterlife and the physical world. Through strategic combat, puzzle-solving, and unraveling a rich narrative, uncover the secrets of your past and fight for a second chance at life.

name: Guns & Bots
summary: Fight unstoppable robot horde on the arena, survive, unlock new gears, weapons and characters. Test your skill!

name: Gunboat God
summary: Become the all-powerful Gunboat God in this fluid shoot 'em up. Carve the waves as you stylishly fight hordes of monsters in hundreds of quick-fire missions. Transform your Gunboat and upgrade your weapons, skills and abilities to take on giant, challenging, multi-stage bosses!

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• GUNDAM BREAKER 4
• Deluxe Edition Bonus (Gunpla Parts Early Unlock - 15 Base Kits)
• Season Pass
- 5 Story Missions
- Season Pass Bonus (set of parts to recreate the Gunbarrel Strike Gundam - Gundam Breaker Ver.)
• Diorama Pack Set
- 4 Diorama Packs
- Diorama Pack Set Bonus (Gundam Breaker Series easel and poster set to display in Diorama Mode)

name: Gummy Nightmares
summary: Step into the enigmatic world of Gummy Nightmares as a little boy who wakes up in a mysterious amusement park with no memory. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover lost memories while evading sinister plushie robots. Use weapons, set traps, and find hideouts to survive and reveal the truth

name: Guess the Flag!
summary:
Embark on a global journey with the game “Guess the Flag!”

Test your knowledge of 255 countries, islands and international organizations in 6 addictive modes. Test your memory by matching the flag to the name of a country or play the reverse mode. If you are already an expert in flag knowledge, you can try the mode in which you have to write the name of the country yourself. Feel the thrill of matching locations to a country and, for a change, immerse yourself in the unpredictable random mode that combines all the challenges.

name: Gunnel Vision
summary:
Gunnel Vision was made in 3 days for the Blockjam on Humble Bundle and was developed by Ludosity. It is now available for free on itch.io and is featured in Scrap Pack 4 on Daniel Remar's website.

Gunnel Vision is all about guns. The more guns the better.
Pick up a gun - shoot a gun. Pick up two guns, shot with two guns. Pick up 100 guns - MAYHEM! In Gunnel Vision you don't need an inventory - use your entire arsenal at once until your vision is blocked by it - with nothing left to see but the enemy dead center.

name: Gunman Clive
summary: A port of the Game Boy edition of Gunman Clive with some altered colors. It is only one stage long, like the Game Boy version.

name: Gunswitch
summary: GUNSWITCH is a top-down arena shooter: Mow through hordes of demonic aliens. Upgrade your weapons to fire thousands of bullets within seconds. Escape space prison with your robot squad. Switch your loadout on the spot to adapt and become a killing machine.

name: Gundam Versus: Navi - Olga, Atra, Fumitan
Guns Arcade: City Crisis VR
summary: Guns Arcade is an OnRail Shooter Arcade Action game in Virtual Reality, where you have to stop the invasion of robots through highly destructible environments

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 14: Queen Dizzy
summary: Adds Queen Dizzy to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 15: Venom
summary: Adds Venom to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 16: Unika
summary: Adds Unika to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 17: Lucy
summary: Adds Lucy to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 4
summary:
Season Pass 4 adds 4 characters to Guilty Gear: Strive with the returning characters Queen Dizzy and Venom, the new character Unika from the anime Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers and the guest character Lucy from the anime Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.
It also includes 2 new stages, the Season Pass 4 Premium Color pack with color #16 for all characters except Lucy and the Season 4 Characters Additional Colors pack for the 3 new Guilty Gear characters.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Blazing Edition
summary: The Blazing Edition of Guilty Gear: Strive includes the base game, the 4 Season Passes, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

name: Gun Crate Raccoon
summary: Gun Crate Raccoon is a fast-paced arcade platformer where you collect crates to skyrocket your highscore and conquer the leaderboard. Climb higher and unfold the mysteries of the Tower.

name: Guardians of Restoration
summary: Top-down robot action game combining action and bullet hell.

name: Guns are Funs
summary: Guns are Funs is a fun and exciting arcade game for people of all ages. It will help develop coordination of movements, accuracy and logical thinking. You have to shoot from a toy cannon at towers made of cubes.

name: Guru Guru
summary: Guru Guru is an 8-player physics-based party game. You and your friends become round and adorable GuruGuru monster, unleashing wild combo moves and smashing your opponents, or YOUR FRIENDS!

name: Guitar Hero: Barões da Pisadinha
summary: Guitar Hero: Barões da Pisadinha is an unlicensed game from Brazil that is a rom hack of Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock featuring songs from the band Barões da Pisadinha.

name: Guitar Hero III Suicide
summary: Guitar Hero III Suicide is an unlicensed version of Guitar Hero III for the PlayStation 2 which adds more songs.

name: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario
summary: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario is a bootleg game for the PlayStation 2 released in Brazil. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero III featuring primarily songs from the Mario and Sonic games.

name: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne
summary: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne is a bootleg PlayStation 2 game. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero II which adds songs by Avril Lavigne into the game.

name: Gus Game
summary: Gus Game is a multiplayer party game that immerses you in a fantastic world full of hilarious and competitive mini-games. Gus Game allows you to compete against your friends in challenges such as cannonball throwing, obstacle courses, and much more...

name: Guntris
summary: Blast your way through a low poly Western world in this thrilling Tetris style adventure. Use your six-shooter to clear lines and outlaws. Enjoy fast-paced action, stunning visuals, and unique gameplay. Saddle up, download Guntris today, and become the ultimate sharpshooting legend!

name: GuiGui
summary: GuiGui is a clicker game where you click on a cute character named GuiGui! In GuiGui, every click brings you closer to collecting more adorable GuiGui characters and items! Every 3 and 18 hours, you get a random character item from the GuiGui universe.

name: Gum Flesh
summary: Gum Flesh is a turn based roguelike that takes place on the back of a celestial monster. Use your wits and fragile supplies to take on strange creatures and fauna on a planet where you are definitely not welcome. The air is different here. Your body is starting to change.

name: Guns of Fury
summary: Guns of Fury is a retro-inspired action platformer that combines the run & gun and Metroidvania genres. Explore a vast interconnected world, gain new abilities and weapons, battle epic bosses and stop the plans of an evil corporation before it’s too late!

name: Guest House
summary: The third of terminal house series.

name: Gunzle
summary: Gunzle is a game made in 3 days for the Nonejam 9. In the game you control Clover and you have to use your gun to pass trought the levels and reach the stars. As the game jam theme was genre mix the game is a mix of Gun and Puzzle.

name: Guinevere
summary: Guinevere is the first and only book of the Guinevere series.

name: Guarded
summary: Guarded is the first and only book of the Guarded series.

name: GuitarFreaks 10thMix & DrumMania 9thMix
summary:
GuitarFreaks 10th Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. The machine can be played by one or two players, and can also be linked with DrumMania 9th Mix. This version features 30 new hit songs with difficult moves.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 2ndMix
summary:
GuitarFreaks 2nd Mix is the second game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. This version includes 40 songs, many of which are new songs.

Gameplay remains the same from the previous version, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 3rdMix
summary:
GuitarFreaks 3rd Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. New to this version is the "Bound Track Mode", which covers the systems of EXTRA/ENCORE stages.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 11thMix & DrumMania 10thMix
summary:
GuitarFreaks 11th Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. The machine can be played by one or two players, and can also be linked with DrumMania 10th Mix. This version adds more than 30 brand new songs, for a total of over 110 songs.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: Guess My Word
summary: A daily word guessing game that is an unofficial clone of one that used to be available on the website simbase.org. Players select a difficulty and attempt to guess a new mystery word each day, where each guess reveals whether the mystery word appears before or after the guess's position in the dictionary. Leaderboards track the fastest finish times and the finishes with the fewest guesses. Players can also play through an archive of all previous days' challenges.

name: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare
summary: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare is a single-player story-based game. Play as Takiko to explore several areas inside her unique reality. Players can interact with various objects, solve puzzles, fight enemies, or discover some unreal phenomena.

name: Guitar Hero Dual Pack: Guitar Hero II & Guitar Hero Aerosmith
Gundam Wing: Wing Assault
summary: This is a flash game that used to be on the Cartoon Network website. It played similar to rock, paper scissors.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: The critically acclaimed Guilty Gear Strive arrives on Nintendo Switch for the first time, complete with the first three season passes of DLC to make for a total of 28 playable characters!

name: Gulping Snake
summary: Gulping Snake is a simple, but not easy, 2D puzzle game.

name: Gum
summary:
Cursed with sticky autonomy, you play as a Gum Person with a thirst for adventure. Navigate your way out of sticky situations and wonder to yourself how much easier it would be if you didn't stick to everything.

Gum is a puzzle game that I've been working on for a little over a week. It started as a quick idea on paper and quickly proved that it had enough complexity to create a full-fledged puzzle game out of. Feedback is appreciated

name: Guns, Beats n' Dragons
summary:
This game was made for the #lowrezjam.
Some dragon talked shit bout your moms... Now it's payback time! Fight your way through deadly flies, crazy shooting mages, explosive bumping red things and not-that-bright golems to go and shut that fool's mouth.

name: Guilty Gear Xrd: Sign - Character Colors Christmas Set
Guess Their Answer
summary:
Some people have an amazing ability to read minds. They seem to know what others are thinking of even before they say it. If you are that kind of a person, this game is just for you!

Here you need to guess what the other players answered to a certain questions. It can be anything, so just say the first thing that comes to your mind. Then compare your reply with the answers of the rest.

Play this fun and simple game online and see how many answers you can guess!

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Season Pass
summary: The Season Pass grants access to 5 Story Missions and a bonus DLC.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Realm of Frost and Inkwash
summary: The Realm of Frost and Inkwash is arrivingBrush and ink swing, frost chills the scene. Two new heroes Momo and Lyn are waiting to depart on a journey with you! Before the journey begins, Momo wields the calligraphy brush and brings us four unique and fantasy weapons from the painting world.

name: Guess the Intro
summary: Guess the Intro is an unreleased mobile game by Spotify. The game was a music quiz where players had to guess what the song playing is based on the intro alone. Not much is known about the game apart from it's listing in the TestFlight Teraleak.

name: Gui Long Chao
summary: Gui Long Chao is a 3D action-adventure game It takes place in a new city "Kowloon", where tradition and modernity collide. As its name suggests, the city consists of nine neighborhoods, where the streets and alleys are filled with a retro, trendy and bizarre atmosphere. Of course, in the corners where the streetlights don't shine, there are also treacherous undercurrents. You will play the role of a "film director", form a "crew", and set out to collect clues under the guise of "filming" in the nine neighborhoods, where order and chaos coexist in different styles, to gradually uncover the truth buried in the city.

name: Gubble
summary: Gubble is a puzzle game where your goal is to unscrew all the screws on each level in order to win.

name: Guardians of the Sanctree
summary: You and allies, avian inhabitants of Sanctree City, build structures and production lines on the tree, crafting weapons to fend off subterranean insects. Defense is just the start—dig deeper, destroy nests, fortify new defenses against escalating threats for an impregnable stronghold.

name: Gurk in Trouble: A Yip Quest Story
summary: A short fantasy adventure where you play as a kobold trying to break free from your master, the evil wizard Banannan.

name: Gun Frog
summary: Gun Frog is a unique physics-based movement shooter where you bounce on lily pads, kill flies and explore a vibrant world as a frog that ate a gun.

name: Guidus Zero
summary: A real-time grid-based action roguelike game. Explore the sinkhole known as the "Scar" to search for spirits and treasure chests, and defeat the corrupted enemies and bosses as you strive to reach the deepest floor of the Scar, where the source of chaos awaits.

name: Gullet
summary: Gullet is a tension-fueled psychological horror game in which you will rappel down into and explore a colossal mouth post-rapture and control how quickly you descend by how tightly you squeeze your left hand brake in real life and in the game.

name: Guess Where You Are
summary: GuessWhereYouAre.com is an immersive, free-to-play geography guessing game where players are dropped into a random location and must guess where they are in the world.

name: Gunz & Golf
summary: Gunz & Golf is a single-player, physics-based precision platformer. Master 3 unique guns, blast your ball through outlandish obstacles, and conquer a handcrafted pixel art course by the omnipresent Developer. Prepare for hilarious frustration and satisfying triumphs!

name: Gummy Jump 2
summary: You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you

name: Guardians of Altarris: The Sinless Blade
summary: A lifetime of mystical combat training will be put to the test on this mission to save your home world of Altarris. A gorgeously animated epic with a cinematic aesthetic and soundtrack, Guardians of Altarris is one of those rare games that combines great graphics with an engaging story and addictive gameplay. Make the ultimate sacrifice to summon the Guardian and save Altarris!

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 1 - Colony Set
Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 2 - Mobile Weapon & Colony Laser Inner Wall
summary: Diorama Pack 2 includes 1 background, 7 Mobile Weapons, and 13 Key Art Posters.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 3 - Class Room Set & Haro
summary: Diorama Pack 3 includes 1 background, 20 Objects, 6 Haro set, and 20 Key Art Posters.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 1 - Go! Restart!!
Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 2 - Brave Dive
Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 3 - Battle Tournament
summary: Story Mission DLC 3 - BATTLE TOURNAMENT includes an additional story, which is a sequel to the main storyline, and additional Mobile Suits.

name: Gun Shop Dealer Simulator
summary: Master the art of gunsmithing and business!

name: Gun Bro
summary: GunBro is an action-packed side-scrolling run ‘n’ gun game

name: Gun Reflex VR
summary: Realistic VR shooter game where you try to complete all the floors by killing your enemies with limited ammunition. It also features zombie, shooting range, and weapon carnival modes.

name: Guns, Blocks, and Steel
summary: A voxel-based multiplayer FPS with fully destructible terrain and an emphasis on strategy, tactics, and resource management. Play singleplayer with bots or multiplayer PVP/co-op.

name: Gun Factory Simulator
summary: Take control of your very own firearms factory. Start with a workshop and a gun shop, and evolve it into a factory of mass destruction. Craft bullets to rockets, handguns to shotguns, design your own weapons, and become a merchant of death. Get use to the smell of gunpowder and cash.

name: Gun Store Simulator
summary: Take control of a gun store in Gun Store Simulator and manage every aspect of the arms trading business. Buy licenses, select products, hire staff, and ensure safety to grow your store and build a successful chain. Can you dominate the market?

name: Guardian Grids
summary: A pixel tower defense game packed with strategy and fun! Build Archer Towers, Magic Towers, Poison Traps, and Cannons to defend your castle from waves of monsters. With diverse levels, random cards, and upgrades, every battle feels fresh. Ready to defend? Begin your journey now!

name: Gura Christmas 2024
summary: Celebrate the Christmas season with a merry jigsaw puzzle with various Guras drawn by many talented Hololive artists!

name: GunCat
summary: GunCat is a 2D platformer where you play as a gun-wielding cat that tries to make it's way through a laboratory filled with zombies.

name: Gunsim
summary:
GUNSIM is a GUN SIMulator. Collect, shoot, upgrade and customize your guns as you blast through endless levels of tactical training. Put your skills to the test and destroy the dummy army before they take over! Just when you think you’re getting the upper hand, these dummies get tougher and start to multiply. You’ll need to upgrade your guns and collect more so we stand a chance!

Use a wide variety of beautiful 3D weapons that sound and feel awesome to use.
Shoot all kinds of fun targets in challenging and unique levels.
Earn cash and upgrade your guns to be the absolute best!
Super easy to learn, but takes serious skill to master.
Every gun is hand crafted by firearms experts to feel like the real thing.

name: Gun Fire: AI Rebellion
summary: The futuristic Human City has been plunged into crisis by an invasion of AI robots. Experience intense battles against advanced AI drones and giant robots!

name: GuGu Pizza: Delivering Pizza to the Space Station? Boss, This is Just Not Right!
summary: GuGu Pizza’s motto is to deliver anywhere! So couldn't refuse the pineapple pizza order that came from the space station. Eventually, the pigeon deliveryman begins a high-altitude jump to deliver pizza to space, passing through the city, forest, and sky...

name: GunMania
summary: A target shooting arcade game where the player uses an airgun to fire real BBs at on-screen targets.

name: Guild Receptionist 2: Stardust Liberate
summary: Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life! This is a simulation game of a receptionist. Whether you run around to protect your village, follow the king, or expose the darkness that pervades the country, the future depends on your choice!

name: Guilty as Sock!
summary: Enter a chaotic courtroom where socks play lawyers, prosecutors, and judges! Use absurd evidence, craft wild arguments, and deliver verdicts in this hilarious online party game. Improvise, strategize, and shout "Objection!"—because in Guilty as Sock!, chaos always wins!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E.: Complete Bundle
summary: The gun-wielding badass is back, evolved, more stylish and better than ever! Become Grave, a resurrected gunslinger and ruthless anti-hero set within a beautiful third-person action shooter.

name: Guitar Hero II: Indonesia 2021
summary: Guitar Hero II: Indonesia 2021 is an unlicensed PlayStation 2 game from Indonesia. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero II which adds Indonesian songs from the year 2021.

name: Gunma's Ambition: You and me are Gunma - Reiwa 2nd National Census Edition
summary: Let's change Japan to Gunma. Everyone Gunma.Let's change all of Japan to Gunma.The definitive edition of the Gunma simulation game.Everyone can play!

name: Gunner-chan!
summary: A 2.5D top-down, roguelike shooter set in a base that has descended into chaos due to an experiment gone awry. Fight the robots that have gone haywire and resolve the crisis.

name: Guess Who?
summary: Ask clever questions to guess your opponent’s mystery character before they guess yours!

name: Gunzle: Clover And Claus
summary:
a game made in 3 days for a gamejam, where you control the characters Clover and Claus to go through levels
it's a puzzle game, with the main mechanics being a weapon, used to destroy certain blocks, the cloner of the character Clover

name: Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors Axl Low
Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors Jack-O'
Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors Jam Kuradoberi
Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors I-No
Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors - Faust
Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors - Johnny
Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors - Elphelt Valentine
Guilty Gear Xrd: Sign - Character Colors PlayStation Plus Set
Gun Sprint
summary:
Flip the gun and move forward to reach the goal!

When you tap the screen, the gun will shoot and flip forward or backward!
Focus on the tap timing, shoot the enemies, and get high score!

name: Guild Shop Simulator
summary: Supply materials, craft powerful gears, and run a guild shop. Support guild dungeon conquests and become the top supplier for raiders. Combine all your guild members' skills to conquer dungeons and seize rare materials from monsters!

name: Gunso's Skateboard Run
summary:
Skateboard × Turtle = Exciting Run Game!
Dash at full speed to meet Koyuki-chan!
Collect coins and activate Fever Dash!

name: Gunlocked 2
summary: Movement is your weapon. A sci-fi action roguelike and shmup combined, in Gunlocked 2 you'll pilot and upgrade a state-of-the-art warship against endless waves of deadly aliens. Deep customization, branching paths, and tons of unlockables offer endless replayability!

name: Guide To Apocalypse
summary: Did you dream of being an astronaut? After a nuclear wastewater crisis, Earth splits into three factions. As a Space Agency astronomer, will you escape to the stars with your beloved or face the storm? Shape your destiny and craft your own Guide to Escaping a Decaying Earth.

name: Gun Down the Gungan
summary: Not too long ago, in a galaxy not very far away at all, George Lucas created cool characters, like Chewbacca and Boba Fett. Two decades later, possessed by the ghost of Walt Disney, he created perhaps the greatest attrocity ever known to mankind: the effeminate, Jamacian wannabe: Jar Jar Binks. This creature annoyed the shit out of each and every one of us. Some of us even puked. Now, thanks to the almighty Zooass, you can rid the world of this evil for good.

name: Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Sunfall Vale
summary: Expand your adventure with this additional card pack for Guardians of Greyrock!

name: Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - The Dying Forest
Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Illwater Marsh
summary: Expand your adventure with this additional card pack for Guardians of Greyrock!

name: Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Ancient Necropolis
Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Frozen Peak Pass
summary: Expand your adventure with this additional card pack for Guardians of Greyrock!

name: Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Traps And Treasure
summary: Expand your adventure with this additional card pack for Guardians of Greyrock!

name: Guardians of Greyrock: Card Pack - Summoner's Henge
summary: Expand your adventure with this additional card pack for Guardians of Greyrock!

name: Gundertale
summary:
Undertale, but you have a gun and you can shoot things.
It's like a mod called DELTAGUN but in UNDERTALE.

name: Gunbug
summary: Unleash mayhem as a heavily armed centipede in this top-down 2D shoot 'em up. Start with sharp mandibles and build your ultimate arsenal to survive relentless hordes and boss battles. Play solo or team up with up to nine friends for multiplayer mayhem. Guns, bugs, and chaos - what could go wrong?

name: Guerra Tribal
summary: In Guerra Tribal (Tribal War) the player takes command of a tribe, constructing special buildings and recruiting warriors to conquer neighboring tribes belonging to other players. With each tribe conquered, the user gains more money and status.

name: GunBang
summary: GunBang is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you face off hordes of enemies and bosses. Choose from a variety of weapons, traits and items to create unique builds and survive until observers are satisfied!

name: Guild no Uketsukejou desu ga, Yoko-scroll game ni natta no de Boss wo solo toubatsu shiyou to omoimasu.
summary:
An original web browser game that will be available via a code with the release of Blu-ray/DVD Volume 5 of "I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I'll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time ".

Help Alina Clover to vent all her frustrations of overtime work on the monsters!

name: Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors: Baiken
summary: This DLC will add five more Baiken character color palettes to the game 'Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2.'

name: Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors: Bedman
summary: This DLC will add five more Bedman character color palettes to the game 'Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2.'

name: Guild Receptionist: Good Luck
summary: Become a guild receptionist and save the world! Or pay back your debts! This is a simulation game of a receptionist. Serve the King or turn to the Demon King, the future depends on your choice!

name: Gun in 60 Seconds Remix
summary: Gun in 60 Seconds Remix (G.I.S.S.R.) puts you in the boots of Billy Bang Bang, a gunslinger out to prove that he's the best shot out there. Equipped with a .44 Magnum and a Boom Stick, you have 60 seconds to help Billy shoot the different objects launched by the machines from both sides.

name: Guess Me If You Can
summary: Welcome to a museum where every picture is a real product from the internet! Explore the exhibits, guess their prices, and test your intuition - how much does that vintage toaster or rare figurine cost?

name: Guardians
summary: Explore each room to find items and equipment and defeat the boss.

name: Guardian of the Grave
summary: A action arcade style horror maze game with a 1700s clonial pirate theme set in a fictional universe. Collecting Souls fighting the Undead while running for you life from the monster that lurks in the tomb.

name: Gudrun's Solitaire Duel
summary: Two-player online solitaire duel.

name: Gunpyre
summary: Hold your Gunpyres akimbo in this fast-paced twin-stick shooter, set in the Crypt Alchemist’s semi-procedural dungeon. Remember, Vampyres are your guns and blood types are your bullets, so be assured to brutally steal them from your enemies in order to collect upgrades and take down your target.

name: GunStar's Gambit
summary: "Really it's just a Clicker Game." But.. The thrilling prospect of discovering hidden gold every three hours has captivated both adventurers and wealth seekers. GunStar's Gambit to provide players and sensation of constant and incremental progress.

name: Guilt
summary:
"Yesterday, I played with my big brother. Yesterday, I killed my big brother. Ah, I forgot to bury his corpse."

The story revolts around a girl named Eli and her sickly big brother, Lit. It all began with the younger sibling's story. Then the truth may unfold at the end of the older sibling's point of view...

Though, in this dream-like reality where happiness no longer exists for them... Will Eli, or rather, both of them find the reason behind all of these meaningless truths?

name: Gun Mayhem
summary: a 2011 Arena Fighting game with too much ammo falling.

name: Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors Chipp Zanuff
Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Alternate Costume Elphelt
summary: This add-on allows you to use Elphelt Valentine's original 'Guilty Gear Xrd -SIGN-' costume.

name: Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors Answer
Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors Dizzy
Guilty Gear Xrd Rev 2: Character Colors Eclipse Set
Guest Rush
summary: Become the ultimate housekeeper in this fast-paced retro arcade challenge! Clean hotel rooms as quickly as possible to keep the guests happy and the hotel running. Inspired by classic 80s games, Guest Rush delivers pixel-perfect nostalgia with charming 8-bit visuals and sounds. Can you keep up with the rush?

name: Guilty Gear Xrd 2: Character Colors Kum Haehyun
Guilty Gear Xrd 2: Character Colors Ky Kiske
Guilty Gear Xrd 2: Character Colors Leo Whitefang
Guitar Hero III: ZV K-ON! 10th Anniversary - 2nd Version
Gutterball 2
summary: Get bonkers with Gutterball 2! Bigger and better than the original, Gutterball 2 takes bowling to the next level. Unlock custom bowling balls and wacky alleys as you battle your way through challenging computer oponents and performance milestones. You'll be blown away by fantastic graphics, special effects and hilarious comic relief.

name: Gunfinger
summary: Grab a gun and get shooting in Gunfinger: The Zombie Apocalypse! Get it now and help take down Dr Monday and his zombie army!

name: Guilty Gear Xrd: Rev 2 - Character Colors Zato-One
Gun Dream
summary: I tihnk my favourite things about this game is just watched the reflections and shadows and things move about. Filling a room with glittery bullets. Trappign furniature mid-air and spinning.

name: Gutter Priestess
summary:
Enter a side-scrolling industrial hell pit.
Punch businessmen. Collect synthesizers.
Untie us from digital bondage before the screen melts.

name: Guard Break
summary: A tribute to the golden era of '90s 3D JRPGs. Explore diverse environments, strengthen your party, and battle ruthless foes as you unravel the secrets behind a mysterious threat.

name: Gun Shop Simulator
summary: Manage your own gun store, selling firearms from pistols to rifles. Test your collection at the shooting range, compete with others, and expand your business.

name: Guild & Gals
summary: Assume the role of a guild master for adventurer's guild, hire mercenaries to embark on dangerous missions and forge meaningful relationships with a large roster of beautiful women powered by adaptive AI in this fantasy management game with RPG elements.

name: Gulltastrophe
summary: It's time to cause a Gulltastrophe! Fly, Dash, and Poop on people. Kick all of them out and take back your island.

name: Gun Center Simulator
summary: Enter the world of a gun shop as a passionate collector who opens his own gun center! Create and manage your own gun center where you trade, customize and sell firearms, from classic pistols to cutting-edge weapons.

name: Guardian Chicken
summary: Build towers, grow crops, and stop a mad scientist's undead army in this chaotic, comedy-filled tower defense game.

name: Gumshoe Detective Agency: The First Case
summary: Use a 90s computer interface to search online articles, collect clues, and navigate office politics in a police procedural-style investigation to solve the case of a missing heiress in Gumshoe Detective Agency: The First Case.

name: Guardian of the Rebellion
summary: A classic war-chronicle fantasy SRPG set on the continent of Falnea, where beings known as “Guardians” wield power beyond mortals. Lead Arzes—the son of a Guardian—against the Ruzeroa Empire’s bid for unification and the shadowy forces stoking the war.

name: Gunstoppable
summary: Dual-wield devastating weapon combos in this momentum-fueled Roguelite FPS. Chain movement, stack every upgrade, and bend time to overpower the odds in style!

name: Gunny Ascend
summary: A Roguelite Block-Stacking Adventure — Stack, Adapt, Escape! Gunny Ascend is a high-speed puzzle game where every falling block is a chance to escape. Build clever loadouts, adapt to ever-changing hazards, and outsmart the Collectors in this chaotic, dimension-hopping adventure.

name: Guardian Grids 2
summary: A super casual and relaxing tower defense game, fully upgraded from the previous generation! Light roguelike elements — click to choose your card each round!

name: Guardians of the Wild Sky
summary: Survive, build, craft and explore a vast magical world as you capture and bond with powerful Guardians. Captain your own airship and sail the cloud seas. Build everything from cozy homes to flying castles. Explore this world solo or with friends; the skies are yours to conquer!

name: Guns and Spookies
summary: Fast-paced, wave based arena shooter roguelike with hand-drawn 2D art. Unlock new weapons, items and characters with unique abilities to move through five distinct stages full of enemies and bosses.

name: Gun Paradise
summary: A tense 20-minute battle, using firearms and skills to eliminate enemies. Upgrade and select MODs to enhance yourself, complete various battlefield missions to learn skills, and obtain weapon materials. Maintain rapid growth in abilities to survive in the game.

name: Gutfarm
summary: Gutfarm is a top-down 2D pixel art game that blends farming, tower defense, and survival elements. On this alien island, you will expand and grow your farm by planting crops, unlocking genetically mutated varieties, defending against waves of monster attacks, collecting relics, and more!

name: Gun Dealer
summary: Gun Dealer – buy and sell weapons, handle risky deals, avoid the law, and grow your own powerful arms empire.

name: Gun in a Well
summary: Gun in a Well is an action roguelike where the only way to dodge is to shoot. Jump around using recoil, kill enemies with bullets, destroy them with electricity or burn them to crisp. Manage health and ammo, choose your upgrades, break the game and reach the bottom of the well!

name: Gun Shop Manager
summary: Gun Shop Manager is a 3D simulation game where you run a gun shop with help from the mafia. Clean, customize, and test weapons to satisfy your shady customers. Order parts, create unique designs, and close risky deals with gangs just be careful not to catch the police’s eye.

name: Gu-gu Ganmo: Run-run Odekake Date Da ze ii
Guitar Hero 3-Disc Set
summary: Guitar Hero 3-Disc Set is a compilation pack of PlayStation 2 Guitar Hero games that were developed by Harmonix including Guitar Hero, Guitar Hero II, and Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, published by Activision.

name: Gunjou no Sora wo Koete
summary:
You start off as Yashiro, one of the two first rank students in a flight combat school maintained by the army. Japan is split into two factions and the situation is tense, with small battles being held here and there.
His father was the one who caused the entire splitting up and tense situation, with the proposal of some yen economic plan.
Life isn’t exactly as easy as normal school life over there, with it’s hardcore training. Still, he still manages to talk with friends and just act like a somewhat normal guy of his age should act.
But things never go right. Rumors have that a war is starting. That means he’ll have to go out to the frontlines as a pilot killing people. Can he save what his father has caused or can he even survive till the end of the war?

name: GunOre
summary: In GunOre, your gun is your ultimate tool - use it for movement, collecting resources, purchasing upgrades, robots, and defending your mine! Automate your operations and build your defenses as you master the art of movement. Have a cozy time in this active idler mining ore and fighting monsters!

name: Gut Eater
summary: Gut Eater is a psychological horror game where you must survive under the threat of a hungry cat . Take care of him… or he'll play with your stomach. Oppressive management, constant unease.

name: Gun Builder Elite HD
summary: Build guns the way you want with a large selection of parts and attachments. Various camos for any combat situation. Customize your optics. Disassemble your weapon and rotate with touch gestures. It's all here in realistic 3D.

name: Gun Building 3
summary: Build & Fully Customize.

name: Gutbuster
summary: Digest the ravenous Rebbecca's meals in this arcade style run and gun erotic comedy game. Dodge and blast the chewed food, collect powerups, and spend lipids at the upgrade shop to survive the challenge and prevent indigestion! For mature players.

name: Gunball: Emperor's Revenge
summary: Gunball: Emperor's Revenge is a game in the Gunball series. It's a fighting game that takes place in a land populated by spherical combat robots called Gunballs that are outfitted with various weapons.

name: Gundam Card Game Teaching App
summary: The tutorial app for the Gundam Card Game, launching simultaneously worldwide in July 2025, is now available! Enjoy the Gundam Card Game on your smartphone or tablet!

name: Gunball Saves Christmas
summary:
Even the robots has Christmas. The Icy Band of snow lands stoled the Snow Crystal. Without it, the gunballs planet would not be able to meet Christmas!
Find crystal and save the holiday!

name: Gunball Arena
summary: Fascinating Top-down shooter with lots of variety of weapons, different enemies and a variety of levels. Can you defeat all guardians of the arena and become the new emperor?

name: Guy Who Sells Jars
summary: Step into the shoes of a brand-new jar shop owner! Create and sell jars to over 200+ unique customers! Be careful though, some jar shop owners don't take lightly to new competitors...

name: Guns of Gaia
summary: Take back your planet from alien invaders! Guns of Gaia is a game that blends survival and base-building elements. Use biotechnology to alter the landscapes, build defenses, set traps, and deploy bait. Nurture creatures, unlock equipment and weapons. Defeat your enemies and conquer your planet!

name: Gunsmith
summary: Play with Gunsmith before you buy! This build is available to show off Gunsmith's predictive gameplay and will improve as the plugin works up to release.

name: Guiling's Adventure
summary: An action oriented shooting horror game, where players will be the hero GUILING from mysterious Eastern continent and engage in battles with demons to find ways to break curses, defeat zombies, and seal evil spirits. Can we fight against evil forces and escape from the cursed land?

name: Gun Dealer Simulator
summary: Run your own store from the ground up! Stock shelves, set prices, pay bills, and maintain a clean environment to boost your reputation. Buy goods from local suppliers across town. Bet your earnings and become the go-to destination for firepower.

name: Guild Wars 2: Visions of Eternity
summary:
Tyria’s leaders are anxious about rumors of covert Inquest voyages launched in search of the island of Castora, an island so remote that it’s long been thought to be inaccessible—or even nonexistent. The risks involved prevent all but the most tenacious (and perhaps foolhardy) of pursuers from investigating the Inquest’s plan. Your race to discover the Inquest’s plot will lead you across two new open world regions at launch, each filled with magical energies and strange creatures. Two additional maps will open as the story continues over the course of a year.

During your travels, you’ll unlock three new Mastery tracks, including one for your Skimmer mount that will unlock new and updated abilities. The new region also brings new adventures, collections, and thematic rewards. Players who own both Guild Wars 2: Visions of Eternity and Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds will be able to unlock a new Castoran Homestead map.

A new elite specialization for each profession will unlock new traits, profession mechanics, and healing, utility, and elite skills. Further augment your build by acquiring new relics themed to your adventures in Castora. And work towards six legendary rewards: three new legendary weapons, plus a ring, accessory, and aquabreather.

The magically infused landscape of Castora is home to all manner of strange, warped wildlife. Two of the three major updates coming in 2026 will pit players against the most powerful of the island’s denizens in Raid Encounters (including Challenge Modes and a Legendary Mode) and a new Convergence. Along with the first of the new Raid Encounters, new system updates will make raids easier to access. A Fractal with an accompanying Challenge Mode will also release with the last of the major expansion updates.

New emotes, armors, weapons, recipes, and other unique rewards await those who brave the dangers of Castora, and seasonal Wizard’s Vault refreshes throughout the expansion will bring additional options for unique aesthetic rewards.

To support the addition of a new Homestead map, we’re introducing two additional features. The first, the ability to freely swap between the Janthiri and Castoran maps, is helped by the second feature, Layouts. Layouts create a file you can use to save, load, share, and edit arrangements of decorations. We’ll share more about these and other features as we get nearer to the launch of Guild Wars 2: Visions of Eternity.

name: Gumbo* and the Machine
summary:
A 2D Tower Defense Shooter Platformer!
You play as Gumbo as you emerge from your MACHINE!

Buy Upgrades from chef peppino he isn't too happy about his demotion from main character to shop keeper but he may know secrets...

Go through 7 waves with a final boss or tough it out through the infinite gauntlet!

and you must. At all cost. Protect me.
I am what matters.
I am the genesis

I am the MACHINE!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Street Grave
summary: Become the gunslinger and mow down your enemies in style with the Street Grave costume.

name: Gu Zhen Ren: Reverend Insanity
summary: The game takes place in a fantasy world known as the "World of Gu". In this world, those who open their spiritual apertures and refine Gu insects are called "Gu Masters", and they channel the power of True Essence and Immortal Essence. In the World of Gu, you will play as Gu Yue Fang Yuan.

name: Gumball 3000: World Tour
summary: Celebrate the 25th anniversary of the legendary Gumball 3000 Rally with Gumball 3000: World Tour, the most exclusive and thrilling road trip ever on your mobile! This year, the Gumball 3000 Rally takes you on a spectacular journey through five countries in Southeast Asia, from the vibrant streets of Vietnam to the bustling metropolis of Singapore.

name: Gumball Guesser
summary: A code-guessing puzzle game where you will decipher the correct combination of gumballs to solve a puzzle. You'll challenge yourself by raising the bar on the difficulty of the puzzles you'll solve.

name: Guardian
summary:
You are Guardian. Your mission is to use your mighty paws to stop zombies from attacking the neighborhood kids!

Retreat candies from these brain-craving brutes, and put the sugar where it belongs! (In child stomachs, of course).

name: Gunita
summary:
In this short interactive story, you play as Angelo, a grandson navigating the delicate moments with his beloved Lola. Through various tasks like tidying up the house, answering the phone, and interacting with Lola, your choices lead to different endings that explore themes of memory, family, and regret. The goal of the game is to showcase Filipino culture, emphasizing the love and bond between Filipino grandparents and their grandchildren.

"I dedicated this game to my grandmother, Inang" ️

"I’ve made the game free for everyone to enjoy. I’ll still work on game development from time to time, but I need to shift my focus to my new job for now."

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 4 - Battle Fiercely
summary: Story Mission DLC 4 - BATTLE FIERCELY includes an additional story, which is a sequel to the main storyline, and additional Mobile Suits.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Story Mission DLC 5 - Beyond Borders
summary: Story Mission DLC 5 - BEYOND BORDERS includes an additional story, which is a sequel to the main storyline, and additional Mobile Suits.

name: Gundam Breaker 4: Diorama Pack 4 - Beach Set & Effect
summary: Diorama Pack 4 - Beach Set & Effect includes 2 backgrounds, 19 Objects, 20 Effect Set, and 12 Key Art Posters.

name: Guardian of Altai
summary: Feel like a true Altai shaman in this simple 3D shooter with magic elements and a fully diegetic interface! Unleash the powers of fire, water, air, and stone. Battle Erlik's golems, free ancient spirits, and restore balance in a mystical world inspired by Altai mythology.

name: GuraQuest
summary: Play as Gawr Gura in this 2D-platformer Hololive Fan game! Jump and dash your way through 3 hand crafted levels and collect hidden shrimp in this vibrant, pixel-art environment.

name: Gun Shooting Range Aim Master
summary: Step into the ultimate VR shooting range! Test your precision, improve your aim in a variety of exciting target-shooting challenges with realistic weapons and dynamic environments.

name: Guardian Realms TCG
summary: Guardian Realms TCG is a cross-platform, fantasy-themed trading card game set in a realm of shifting alliances, rebellion, and magic. Players command powerful Guardians, along with Equipment, Effect, and Field Cards, to battle across three strategic lanes with the goal of destroying their opponent’s Stronghold. By defeating Outposts, players can disable lanes and control the flow of battle, adding layers of tactical depth.

name: Guardian Realms RPG
summary:
Guardian Realms RPG is a story-driven fantasy role-playing game set in a war-torn world divided by rebellion, ancient magic, and shifting alliances. Players step into the role of Artha, a young Imperial captain caught in the collapse of the powerful Rythguard Empire, as the Carrowlands Rebellion rises to challenge its dominance.

The game blends classic turn-based combat with exploration, crafting, and side activities like farming, fishing, and cooking. Players can recruit a diverse cast of companions, each with their own quests and storylines, while customizing their party to face powerful enemies and uncover the truth behind the conflict.

name: Guns Cant Walk
summary: A rage-inducing physics platformer where your only way to move is by blasting guns. Skate, shoot, and fling yourself up a chaotic office tower to reach the top.

name: Gudetamarun: Running Gudetama! But Gudetama wants to be Gudegude
summary: Unique and Cute! A Laid-Back Side-Scrolling Action Game

name: Guncaster
summary: Blast your way through hordes of minions to take back your tower in a world filled with evil and chaos. Explore charming, ever-changing environments, expand your arsenal of spells, and reclaim your stolen art of GUNCASTING.

name: Guess Pictures: Animals
summary: This quiz game is a great choice when you want to learn something, when you feel boring, or when you want to kill some free time. Can you find the words for every animal picture? Train your brain and learn new words by solving guessing the pics.

name: Gunsmith Master Simulator
summary:
Step into the role of a master gunsmith in Gunsmith Master Simulator. Design,
craft, and refine an impressive variety of firearms, tailoring each weapon to meet
precise standards. Explore the mechanics of guns in depth, perfecting
performance, balance, and handling while managing your workshop and tools.

name: Guud Dawg!
summary: Embark on a goofy, chaotic adventure as a dog, dodging wacky enemies through a maze of mayhem, all while carrying out your owner's wishes.

name: Guns Craft
summary: Guns Craft is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

name: Gummy Bear Idle: No Job, Just Jelly
summary: From promising officer to Gummy Bear Containment & Management extraordinaire! Dive into this hilarious idle game where your mission is deceptively simple: supervise a ridiculously lazy gummy bear. This "pacifist" needs to produce Star Dust, the magical fuel keeping the entire base afloat. Fail, and it's canned fish for everyone!

name: Guild of Monsters
summary: Guild of Monsters is a lane-based tower defense game inspired by the Plants vs. Zombies series, and similar titles. Play as Cassidy, an estranged princess who ran away from her deadbeat father, and a ragtag group of monsters who have been beaten down by the human kingdom. Make elaborate plans, fight against armies of soldiers, and enact vengeance on the vicious King. Recruit unique and crazy monsters to battle against equally crazy enemies. With the help of in-level upgrades and the mystical Power Cards, you can make your monster squad even stronger than you can ever imagine.

name: Gunman Drift
summary: The driving and shooting game. Gunman Drift is an incredible and satisfying drifting TPS where you drive, shoot, get shot at and get rewarded for it all in the meantime. Keep climbing the ranks until you become the Ultimate Gunman!

name: Gui Chu Da Mao Xian
summary: a text-based visual novel with some RPG elements. As the story progresses, you will collaborate with and fight against Gui Chu stars. Remember, collaborating and fighting is just a means to survive, not an answer to the secrets in this world. Your mission is to figure out the truth of this world.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Blood Heat
summary: Full Rebuild with Unreal Engine 5, GUNGRAVE G.O.R.E BLOOD HEAT delivers stunning visuals and an evolved action system. Experience the explosive fusion of stylish Bullet Ballet and Gunkata in an immersive, adrenaline-pumping action spectacle!

name: Guns&Sodas
summary: GUNS&SODAS is a fast-paced rogue-action arcade where legendary sodas, wild guns, and explosive combos collide. Recover the Primal Sodas and unleash chaos with the power of Vending Machines!

name: Guns of Salvation
summary: A dark Metroidvania where failure is eternal… and redemption is earned in blood.

name: Gunzzle: Warp Master
summary: Coming Soon Gunzzle! Beat the clock evading the floor with your teleportation gun ! Jump over and through abysses, fire, acide and many other deadly threats to get through the portal. Gunzzle Is Endless Hours Of Competitive Fun! Try the Free Demo!

name: Gushers Re-Do Your Room
summary:
Gushers Re-Do Your Room or Gushers Place was an online Flash game/website created to promote the Fruit Gushers Re-Do Your Room sweepstakes that took place in the summer of 2005.

Users would enter a lobby room, register a username and password, and were assigned a room number on a random floor. This room could then be customized with a wide array of pre-made furniture. New items could be obtained by entering codes found on specially marked Fruit Gushers snacks. An "Express Elevator" was available to allow quick access to a room you have already registered, and to enter other user's rooms if they had the right floor, room number, and username.

The game also included a unknown mechanic that would allow other users to "mess up" other's rooms. Possibly with the usage of a mystery box that would explode or "gush" goo all over the room like in the commercial.

name: Gunflare Epoch
summary: "Gunflare Epoch" is a roguelike top-down shooter. Earth has fallen. As rebel rangers—humanity's last hope—plunge into randomized dungeons, arm yourself,and survive endless hordes. Uncover the rebellion's truth in a storm of bullets and scrap.

name: Guild of Hunters
summary: A mysterious miasma spreads across the world, turning local wildlife into terrifying monsters. Guild of Hunters is a turn-based RPG where you recruit new members for your guild, negotiate item prices, and embark on adventures across various regions of a medieval world.

name: Gunfight Arena
summary: Fast-paced top-down PvP shooter where powerful weapons spawn across the map. Grab them fast, outgun your enemies—and beware: death or the ticking clock will send you back to your default gun. Outplay, survive, and claim your spot at the top. Don't waste a second.

name: Gun of Fate: The Silver Gun of Ylia
summary: A shooting adventure RPG game, where you play as a gunslinger in Westland. The main combat system of the game is gun shooting. You can complete quest and side missions, unlock items and equipment, and also play fishing and horse racing mini games.

name: Guilds of Greybrook
summary: Guilds of Greybrook is a roguelike management simulator where you don't play the hero, you pay the heroes! Operate the choppy waters of business ownership, hire adventurers, take contracts, and choose sides in the dangerous power struggles of the frontier.

name: Guillem de Berguedà
summary: Guillem de Berguedà is possibly the first video game in Catalan in history. It was a conversational comic adventure and strategy set in medieval Catalonia, starring a troubadour traveler.

name: Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land
summary: A nostalgic JRPG love letter to the Game Boy Color era! Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land is a lighthearted adventure with challenging turn-based combat. Explore a mysterious world, take on tough opponents, and save the day in a game designed to charm all ages!

name: Guild of Slayers
summary: Survivors-like in full 3D with ragdoll physics. Enemies throw themselves at you as projectiles, crash into allies, and damage each other. Bodies fly. Chaos reigns. Survive waves of undead in the most satisfying horde-slaughter you've ever seen.

name: GU Fighters
summary: GU Fighters is an action roguelike where you unlock and upgrade new abilities after every round of combat. Play with up to 4 players locally or online to create your own unique build and be the first to win, or go solo/co-op to traverse varying environments and defeat hordes of enemies.

name: Gunblade Ranger
summary: Gunblade Ranger is a post-apocalyptic Roguelike top-down shooter. You will use guns and blades to hunt monsters in randomly generated radiation zones, collect mutant abilities, break into the source of the radiation, and face the final challenge.

name: Gutter Night
summary: It’s your first night shift at the bowling alley.

name: Guardian Demon
summary: Protect the helpless peasant Myson from an army of angry orcs for as long as possible in this action arcade game. Defeat hordes of orcs with simple and easy to learn intuitive controls, earn gold to customize Myson's appearance and compete with others to see who can survive the longest!

name: Guild Encounters
summary: Guild Encounters is a minimalist arcade JRPG. Recruit heroes, battle through dangerous zones, and conquer challenging turn-based encounters. Earn Guild Points to unlock new allies, powerful gear, and game-changing items. Face a gauntlet of battles as you journey to the final boss!

name: Guilty Pleasures
summary: You are Marcus Holmes, a young private detective and nephew of the legendary detective Arthur Holmes, known among the elite as the “Detective of Passion” — a man who uncovered the intimate secrets of the rich and famous: affairs, love triangles, model disappearances, scandals in high society.

name: Gunship Global Operations
summary: Take command of the Gunship and rain fire from above! Use powerful weapons, real thermal vision, defend against enemies and support allied forces to dominate missions and change the course of battle.

name: GumPop!
summary: GumPop! is a 3D Puzzle Platformer. Solve Puzzles to find a way to the next room and clear out the sweet factory from mutated sweets with your Bubble Gum Gun.

name: Guild Wars: Reforged
summary: Step into Guild Wars Reforged, the award-winning online roleplaying game enjoyed by millions, now re-energized with system enhancements. Experience the complete saga—from the fall of Ascalon to the desperate stand against Nightfall. Your adventure is just getting started!

name: Guardians Planetfall
summary: From the creators of Guardians Frontline, Guardians Planetfall drops you into a galaxy-wide war for the fate of humanity. Fight assembled into squads of up to 4 soldiers in fast, tactical VR combat across space and dangerous planets filled with aliens, Void soldiers, and massive war machines.

name: Guns and Nuns: Storming Hell
summary: Demons are not the danger, you are the danger!!! play as Angelica Amadeus, a nun with the power of faith and guns. Slay demons at your heart's content on bizarre stages with strange gravity fields. Get highscores to unlock more stages and weapons and teach those filthy demons their place.

name: Guará Guaraná
summary: An incremental tower defense game with farm mechanics, where you grow crops, defend your village, and make it prosper!

name: Gumdrop Gladiator
summary: A candy-themed VR brawler where waves of hungry minions swarm you. Use hand-to-hand combat, silly melee weapons, and candy blasters to knock them back with ragdoll physics. Survive as long as you can before the chaos overwhelms you.

name: Guinea Isles
summary: Train skills, gather resources, fight monsters, hire townsfolk, and rebuild magical islands from the ground up in unique idle-lite adventure.

name: Gun Quest
summary: GunQuest is an action-packed RPG, where you use firearms to combat fantasy creatures. Craft guns, explore an open world, team up with allies, and conquer the infinite plain in GunQuest!

name: Gun Up
summary: Kill the undead, get new weapons, combine weapons, kill even more undead! Over 20 weapons, INFINITE combinations. Featuring different locations to play and survive. How long can you survive?

name: Guerilla Cubes
summary: Guerilla Cubes is an action-packed couch co-op hero shooter where a special ops squad battles through living jungles, scorching deserts, and bone-freezing tundra's to reclaim Cube City from the ruthless BOX BOSS.

name: Gun.Dog.Revenge
summary: GUN·DOG·REVENGE is a high-speed arcade platform shooter, drawing inspiration from NES classics "Rolling Thunder" and "Code Name: Viper", the indie hit "RollingBird" on Steam, and the film "John Wick". Reload! Shoot! Kill the boss! Revenge for your dog.

name: Gun X Gunner
summary: Gun X Gunner is a free-to-play, round-based first-person-shooter where up to eight players face off in fast-paced free-for-alls. Choose new equipment, weapons, and powerful, game-altering augments between rounds in an ever-evolving competition. It’s time to get good, get lucky, and GUN X GUNNER.

name: Gutterspace
summary: Gutterspace is a hand-drawn, poetry-powered couch co-op game about sharing one body and surviving it.

name: Guilty Gear 20th Anniversary Edition: Day One Edition
summary: Day One Edition - Featuring a unique bundle with a message from Ishiwatari and Art-Book.

name: Guǐyāchuáng
summary: Is a first-person perspective horror game, adapted from the producer's personal experiences and real-life events, with the story set in Tainan in 2005. Through the gaming experience, it aims to help players who have never experienced ghost pressing bed understand the fear associated with it.

name: Guts 'n Grunts Jr.
summary: Play a missing classic from the genesis of the 16-bit era. Roll like a hedgehog! Shoot like a soldier!

name: Gun Repair Shop
summary: Become a master gunsmith. Repair, restore, customize, and test firearms in a detailed workshop simulator: buy parts, craft components, renovate classic weapons, and take them to the shooting range to prove your work

name: Guardian of the Sacred Seal
summary: In another world, the protagonist works alongside a mysterious young man, handling requests that appear ordinary but conceal subtle changes beneath the surface. Through repeated choices, relationships between the characters gradually evolve, and the hidden truths of this world slowly come to light.

name: Gun Swinger
summary: Blaze away with blistering fast weapons! Never stop! Swing your self through a world without floors! No Fear! No Brakes! Gain upgrades to increase your ferocious velocity! Unlock new weapons! Solve puzzles! Or relax in the in-game level creator with endless fun and possibilities!

name: Guitar Hero II: Hits Indonesia 2025
summary: Guitar Hero II: Hits Indonesia 2025 is a bootleg hack of Guitar Hero II featuring Indonesian music of the previous year.

name: Guildamation
summary: Guildamation is an Idle AutoBattling RPG that let's you build an automate a guild.

name: Gum Squad
summary: Gum Squad is a co-op PvE shooter set in a quiet world gone sticky. Start with a peashooter, explore together, and gear up to survive the gum epidemic with up to 8 players!
